programme.desc: Jawy y Mane continúan. Xavi decide invitar a Pepe para que se quede en la casa. Los Shore comienzan a dudar de Fernanda. Karime busca al notario para que valide su virginidad y Mane y Fernanda terminan en un fuerte enfrentamiento.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Mane y Fernanda se van a los golpes. El conclave decide hacerle un examen a Fernanda para evitar su expulsión. Un partido de fútbol entre los Shore y los Big hippo decidirá el futuro de la casa y Pepe recibe una propuesta de amor eterno.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: El examen termina y Fernanda se mantiene en la casa. Chile escucha el plan de las rechazadas y las delata. Una maestra de baile pone en su lugar a Mane y a Karime. En un restaurante se desata una batalla campal.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Después de enfrentar a Mane, Dania toma una decisión importante. Los Shore reciben una clase de banda donde nace oficialmente el corrido del “Verga muerta”. Jawy habla con Fernanda y Mane está decidida a dejar sola en la casa a Dania.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Xavier y Pepe se enfrentan nuevamente. Un grupo de brujas llega a la casa y no todos quedan contentos con sus premoniciones. En la noche de noche de chicas, Dania le pide una disculpa a Mane y su reacción deja a varios sin palabras.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Los Shore se preguntan sobre el paradero de Dania. Chile y Diana tienen una cita romántica. Karime y Mane terminan en el hospital. Pepe y Ramiro reciben una llamada que cambia sus planes y los Shore se alistan para el carnaval.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Los Shore llegan el carnaval. Karime y Potro tienen un momento de mucha intimidad. Un hipnotizador llega a la casa. Nacha tiene sospechas y decide hacerse una prueba de embarazo y una nueva integrante llega a las vacaciones.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Mane y Karime le hacen un amarre a sus amados y Nacha explota contra Jey. Potro sorprende a Isa besando a Chile y se molesta. Mane se entera de que Potro está hablando mal de Jawy y toma cartas en el asunto.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: La situación entre Jawy y Potro es cada vez más tensa. Las nuevas se lanzan topless de la tirolesa. Nacha confronta a Isa, mientras que Jawy decide que la playa es el lugar perfecto para aclarar las cosas con Potro.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Talía llega de sorpresa y los lleva de fiesta. Nacha va al hospital. Chile por fin corona con Isa. Los Shores tienen una sesión con Silvia Olmedo; Karime vuelve con Ramiro y trae ganas de trío. Entre Fer e Isa hay pleito de celos por Chile.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Los Shores se preparan para el fin de la aventura en Mazatlán. Los invitados llegan a celebrar la fiesta final. Potro y Tadeo aparecen cuando ya está el pleno desmadre y un incidente entre las mujeres de Chile está a punto de explotar.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: La fiesta final termina en pleito entre el harén de Chile. Mane le prepara a Jawy una ceremonia sorpresa para ratificar su amor. Los Shores se van de la casa, pero Karime y Potro dejan lo mejor para el final.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Unas nuevas vacaciones comienzan para los Shore y en esta ocasión, Acapulco será testigo de las fiestas, amores, desamores y peleas de la familia más disfuncional de la televisión.

programme.desc: Anita Manning's big win at the last auction is proving a sticky wicket for Raj Bisram, who's keen to avoid the wooden spoon. Raj learns about WWII's Operation Dynamo. Anita uncovers the story behind the bloody murder of Thomas Becket.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Philip Serrell and Catherine Southon set off from the midlands in a 1970 Citroen DS20. Phil spends a lot of cash on a 19th-century butter churn, while Catherine finds two attractive 1940s compacts.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Traveling around in a classic Citroen, Catherine Southon finds a nice croquet set and a rare 1930's novelty biscuit tin, while Phil Serrell learns how flying boats gave us the word 'airport.'

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The second of two shows from the gardens of Penshurst Place, Kent, where finds include a tin-plate toy boat, a rare paper toy and a pair of cufflinks by a famous French maker. This is also the last Antiques Roadshow featuring Hugh Scully

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Michael Aspel and the team are at Lichfield Cathedral in the Midlands. Amongst the items are a small statue thought to be from the tomb of Tutankhamun, an early Punch and Judy set and a sword pistol that belonged to Lord Nelson valued at GBP20,000.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team head for mid-Wales where Michael Aspel and team unearth more intriguing finds including a bust of Dylan Thomas, an intricate book of early silhouettes, and a plate bought for £5 turns out to be worth £10,000.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The experts return to Edinburgh in search of Scottish treasure. Amongst the items are an early Mickey Mouse mascot, a rare deco figurine, and documents that once belonged to the bodyguard to Edward and Mrs. Simpson now valued at GBP15,000.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The experts converge on Normanby Hall, where treasures include a marble bust valued at £15,000, a pair of rare candlesticks won in a newspaper competition and Michael Aspel meets a man obsessed by collecting and racing antique lawnmowers.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Antiques Roadshow heads for Tavistock in Devon. Inside the Pannier Market, they discover a cache of curiosities, including an inmate's uniform from the early days of Dartmoor prison and a plate, bought for a song at a boot sale worth GBP1,000.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Michael Aspel digs up unscreened finds from recent Roadshows held at Lichfield and Normanby. Amongst the objects are a ring once owned by the Romanian Royal family, an elaborate bed and a bizarre collection of coffinalia belonging to an undertaker.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Michael Aspel and the team head east to Ipswich, where amongst the treasures they discover a Duke's chamber pot now used to drink champagne, one of the earliest record players and a 50p find on a white elephant stall turns out to be valued at GBP1500.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team enters Border country as the Roadshow visits Manderston. Amongst the items featured are pieces from Queen Victoria's household, a gruesome Man Trap and Lord Palmer's collection of rare biscuit tins now valued in the thousands.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Michael Aspel and the team set up camp in Rochdale's magnificent town hall. Amongst the objects under scrutiny are a gold pencil gifted by King George IV, paintbrushes used by LS Lowry and the diaries of a British hangman.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team visits the Royal Hospital in Chelsea. Amongst the items are a Roulette table built to outwit cheats valued at GBP30,000, a collection of buttons worn by Charles Dickens and a gilded bee from a royal throne thought to have magical powers.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team is at the seaside resort of Ventnor. Under scrutiny is a family portrait showing a Speaker of the House of Commons as a young boy and 75 Austin vehicles. We also hear the story of how a photograph saved a woman's life.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Michael Aspel introduces a selection of unscreened finds from recent Roadshows. Items include an Edward VIII Coronation souvenir that was hastily converted to an abdication mug, early fan mail for Elton John and a collection of art deco treasures.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The Roadshow team head for Lancaster. Amongst the items uncovered in the Town Hall are a valuable pair of clogs, a moving series of letters from Crimea, an anti-slavery ring and a rare and intricately woven tapestry valued at £10,000.

programme.desc: Bellator 298: Storley vs. Ward was a mixed martial arts event produced by Bellator MMA that took place on August 11, 2023, at the Sanford Pentagon in Sioux Falls, South Dakota, United States.

programme.desc: Bellator 299: Eblen vs. Edwards was a mixed martial arts event produced by Bellator MMA, that took place on September 23, 2023, at the 3Arena in Dublin, Ireland.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Watch historic Bellator 300, headlined by a semifinal matchup in the LWGP between current champion Usman Nurmagomedov vs. former champion Brent Primus

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil goes into his mailbag to answer viewers' popular questions! He has help from commedienne and author Teresa Strasser. When Teresa talks to moms on the street, find out their biggest parenting and pregnancy queries. Update on Ted Williams.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Misti says her mother, Lisa, is a "raging alcoholic" failing rehab 3 times and was arrested and charged with her third DUI just days before. Lisa says she's not an alcoholic, just a person who likes to drink. Can Dr. Phil give Lisa a reality check?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil welcomes controversial YouTuber "Agent Sebastian" who runs a page called "Cart Narcs" posting hundreds of explosive videos apprehending shoppers in parking lots who do not return their carts to the corrals. Is "Agent Sebastian" breaking the law?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: A father pleads for help regarding his missing daughter. Gabby Petito, 22, set off on a van trip with her fiancé, but two months later he returned alone. Police revealed the couple had an incident--caught on camera. Gabby's dad is determined to find her.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Author Dr. Philip Zimbardo, The Lucifer Effect: Understanding How Good People Turn Evil, and Dr. Phil examined what makes a good person do bad things. They continue to explore blind obedience to authority & an eye-opening experiment on group conformity.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Alisha says her son, Kevin, 10, pushed the family to the limit with violent outbursts. At home, knives and lighters are hidden & siblings lock themselves in their rooms at night. Alisha's says the 'future Kevin' may hurt the entire family or end a life.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Divorced parents Christina and Jim along with daughter Tara, 21, discuss that dad's new wife is the same age as Tara, how it's ok Tara is a webcam model to help pay bills, and that all this is making Tara a raging, angry monster with low self-esteem.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: One day off heroin Sarah begins painful withdrawals. Tecoa struggles with drug cravings while two weeks clean and six months pregnant. Are Dr. Phil's efforts sabotaged between the twins? Dr. Phil shows the girls a terrifying look into their future. Part 2

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil continues with Sandi, 60, discussing her online relationship with Peter, 22. Dr. Phil speaks to Peter in Nigeria via satellite & he insists he loves Sandi. Will Sandi listen to her daughters' concerns, or will she fly to Nigeria to marry Peter?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Kala Brown made national headlines when she was discovered alive 2 months after disappearng in South Carolina. She was kidnapped, locked in a metal storage container & chained on the neck by a serial killer. Kala speaks about her life in captivity.Pt. 1

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil continues an incredible story of a woman brutally raped at age 15. Loretta identified the alleged rapist and helped police put him behind bars. But her world was rocked 14 years later when the man, Dean, was exonerated due to DNA evidence. Pt. 2

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: From marital spats to disagreements on discipline, learn the biggest mistakes you may be making. Plus, a money expert reveals financial faux pas.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: From curing rare forms of cancer to foreseeing mass destruction, to freeing others from sickness and sin, Julia believes she is "God's chosen prophet". Parents, Mark and Cheryll, worry their daughter is mentally ill with deep concern for the grandkids.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Megan's ex-boyfriend Andy is trying to replace her as their 5-year-old son's mother with his new fiancée, Caitlin. Megan says Andy lied to the judge, falsely painting her as unfit, unstable & a drug addict. Andy says Megan's tale of woe is a sob story.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Kristle, Kayla & Patrick say mom Sherry has blown a $250,000 inheritance in 11 months, with $500 bar tabs & new motorcycles. But that's not it. They say mom takes non-prescribed pills, washes them down with rum & has pulled out a loaded gun while arguing.

channel.display-name: Best of The Drew Barrymore Show

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania" star William Jackson Harper is telling Drew about his role in the new Marvel film, why he took his dog to a pet psychic and how he met his girlfriend.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Jennette McCurdy, author of the best-selling memoir, "I'm Glad My Mom Died," has a very honest and revealing conversation with Drew.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Actress and Director Elizabeth Banks reveals behind the scenes secrets about some of her most famous films and shares why her new film "Call Jane" is so important to her.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Actor Idris Elba and his wife Sabrina Elba join Drew for a lively conversation while cruising around New York City in her minivan, which Drew likes to call her "Drewber.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: The Almond and the Seahorse" star Rebel Wilson is joining Drew. HGTV's Lauren Makk is talking all about candle sticks.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are hitting the hottest headlines in an all-new Drew's News. In a new weekender, they're also sharing their best tips for the weekend.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: The Property Brothers are joining Drew as co-hosts for the entire show! Plus, Drew and Ross Mathews are joined by Jonathan and Drew Scott at the news desk for Drew's News.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: The Talk" co-host Sheryl Underwood is joining Drew and talking all about dating! Drew and Ross Mathews are covering the latest headlines in an all-new Drew's News.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are covering today's hottest topics like why Cher says she shouldn't be called an icon and the recent opinion piece on tipping that has people debating.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Jessica Biel tells Drew about dog sledding and plays "The Real Biel" trivia. Derek Blasberg joins Drew and Ross to cover news, including Dolly Parton's award and throwback fashion.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny-side in a special Game Changers Edition of Drew's News.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew is joined by legendary musician Lionel Richie! "Saturday Night Live" star Sarah Sherman is joining Drew and Ross Mathews at the Drew's News desk.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: In an all-new Drew-gooder segment, Drew has a big surprise for a mother-daughter duo who are empowering and providing resources to underprivileged children and families in their community.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: The People we Hate at the Wedding" stars Ben Platt and Dustin Milligan stop by to chat about their new film. Drew and Ross Mathews are hitting the headlines in an all-new Drew's News.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Fat Joe talks about his memoir, "The Book of Jose," with Drew. Natasha Leggero covers news with Drew and Ross, discussing memory after childbirth and "sitter-vising." Fat Joe and Leo Kelly make caterpillars from old socks.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Renowned OBGYN Dr. Suzanne Gilberg-Lenz is answering burning questions about sexual health including activities that could affect male fertility.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: The Talk" co-host Sheryl Underwood is joining Drew and talking all about dating! Drew and Ross Mathews are covering the latest headlines in an all-new Drew's News.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Carla Hall joins Drew and Ross Mathews for food news, covering an avocado ripeness detector and TikTok restaurant reviews. Carla makes frittata with Drew, while Lindsay Peers and Tariq join for a Thanksgiving craft at "The Craft Studio.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew sits down with tennis superstar Serena Williams to chat about her final match, her family life and her new children's book, 'The Adventures of Qai Qai.' Plus, Serena plays a rapid fire round of all of her favorites in GOATS To Go.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Costume designer Patricia Field is telling Drew all about some of the famous looks she's created for "Sex and the City," "The Devil Wears Prada" and more.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross are joined by beauty guru Zanna Roberts Rassi at the news desk to break down the latest beauty headlines. Then, in an all-new Drew-Gooder, Zanna transforms a busy mom of two and special needs teacher.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Icon Martha Stewart and Drew tackle relationship red flags at the news desk and Martha reveals which young star she simply adores.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: In an all-new Drew Gooder Drew has a big surprise in store for Deloris "NuNu" and Patrick "PopPop" Hogan who run a safe and reliable 24-hour daycare to help the parents in their community.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny side up in an all-new Drew's News. Plus, "Bros" stars Ts Madison, Jim Rash and Miss Lawrence.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Actress and author of the new audiobook, "Inside Voice" Lake Bell stops by to chat.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross cover news about a senior dance troupe and a Jet-Puffed marshmallow pillow. Mark Anderson and Ryan Fey make skirt steak tacos. Damona Hoffman and Drew answer red flag questions.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: RuPaul's Drag Race" host RuPaul is talking about the show and helping Drew come up with her drag name!

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts head to England to visit the castle Jed inherited. Misunderstandings abound, from Jethro mistaking San Francisco for London, to the impounding of Granny's medical supplies, to the real intentions of the elderly chemist.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts finally make it to their new castle and try to adjust to the English way of castle life, at the least the way Jethro thinks it is, based on his understanding of English myths and legends.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: When Jethro gets his draft notice, Jed decides he should pay what it costs the Army to train inductees. When Mr. Drysdale hears this, he starts figuring how he can get Jethro out on a Section 8.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro reports to the induction center after getting his draft notice. The Army isn't quite sure what to make of Jethro.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Since Granny can't plant crops in their yard, Jed thinks the solution is to buy her a plot a land somewhere else. He figures a place called Happy Acres is the best spot to buy land, not realizing it's a cemetery.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro thinks he wants to be a naval frogman, but Granny is concerned her tonic has transformed him. Mr. Drysdale, concerned about finances, has Miss Jane distract Jethro with comics, causing him to want to fly to the moon.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro heads down to the Reserves HQ while wearing an ancestor's Confederate Army uniform. The Sergeant thinks he's an actor there to participate in a Civil War reenactment. Jethro runs home to tell Granny the Civil War is still on.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Col. Blake asks the actor playing Gen. Grant to play along with Granny so that the Civil War movie can continue. Meanwhile, Jethro uses his 6th grade education to take the written test to enter the Reserves.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro believes his moment for Hollywood stardom has arrived. Casting for Bachelor Sheriff Knows Best is occurring, and Jethro mistakenly thinks he has been chosen.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny competes against Mrs. Drysdale as artists and tells Jed about her uncle, the barn painter. Jed and Jethro go to an upscale gallery to buy a painting, but are mistaken for gardeners. Bessie the chimp dabbles with a paintbrush.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: After Ellie seems to be no longer interested in Dash Riprock Granny decides it's time to do a little matchmaking. She thinks the handsome actor would be perfect for Miss Jane.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale talks the Clampetts into hiring a housekeeper. Unfortunately, the housekeeper that is hired is uninterested in doing housework.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny's old friend, the widow Adaline Ashley, comes to Beverly Hills, and Granny sets to playing matchmaker for her and Jed. Mrs. Drysdale and her snooty friends are misled to believe Adaline is a socialite jet-setter.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro decides to turn his favorite thing, eating, into a job by getting the family involved in buying a diner. The family's choice of offerings lead to a lack of customers, so Mr. Drysdale tries to fix things.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro, worried that his diner the Hungry Gizzard has no customers, has a wonderful idea. He busts in on Mr. Drysdale trying to impress the wealthy Vanderpools, announcing the restaurant is going topless. Confusion ensues.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny wants to leave sunny California because she misses winter, sending Mr. Drysdale into a panic. The banker enlists Miss Jane in an elaborate scheme to convince the Clampetts that a blizzard has occurred.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The last televised wrestling match was such a success that the promoter wants a rematch. Granny isn't interested until Rebecca's parents visit.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny is worried about Miss Jane's spinsterhood and convinces Jethro to ask her to marry him. Granny assures him that she will decline the proposal, but Hathaway accepts, leading to panic in the Clampett household.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny is on the warpath concerning the chaos caused by Ellie's critters and declares either they go or she does. Mr. Drysdale is equally irritated by the expense of his wife's poodle. Jed tries to find a solution.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny and Jethro believe they have psychic abilities, but Granny's predictions stop coming true. With her reputation on the line, she picks a stock for Mr. Drysdale that could cost him a small fortune.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Heading to England, Jethro smuggles Ellie's turkey buzzard on the plane upsetting Mr. Drysdale and a fellow passenger. After landing, they try to meet with the Queen to give her their 80 million dollars. Their butler Faversham tries to clear things up.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: After the Clampetts return from London, Granny gets a letter from Hooterville asking her to help with Betty Jo Elliot's baby.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: While Granny is away in Hooterville, Mr. Drysdale hires a gorgeous Italian cook who speaks no English.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny and the Italian chef compete to see who will cook for the family.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts spend Thanksgiving in Hooterville.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale casts Dash Riprock as Homer Noodleman, a potential new lover for Elly May.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro wants a new identity with the replacement of their old truck with a modern hot rod. Granny wants to stay with the old truck. To prove how good the old truck is, Granny races Jethro in his hot rod.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S02E011) Brandon and Brenda's paraplegic cousin Bobby is visiting Beverly Hills - and Kelly finds him extremely interesting!

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S02E012) Andrea wins a high-school journalism contest, but her victory is marred by a school district investigation.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S02E013) The gang goes to a Halloween party, but things take a turn for the worst when Kelly's seductive costume catches the eye of a college student whose intentions are less than honorable.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S02E015) Emily invites everyone to a secret party at an underground club - where she does something that could end her relationship with Brandon forever.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S02E016) Emily refuses to accept the fact that Brandon no longer wants to see her and spirals out of control - and Brenda's the only one who might be able to talk her down.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S02E019) Brandon makes a connection with an aspiring figure skater that could melt ice - but is banned from seeing her by her overprotective coach.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S02E020) Andrea launches a campaign to create awareness about AIDS and other STDs at West Beverly and finds herself going up against some powerful opponents.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S02E021) Kelly's loose lips let slip an explosive secret that almost destroys her mother's relationship with Mel.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S02E022) Dylan's attempts to help a friend through AA put a serious strain on his relationship with Brenda.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S02E024) Brandon's father becomes involved in a lucrative real estate deal - until Brandon discovers that if the deal goes through, Nat will lose the Peach Pit.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S02E025) A robbery at the Peach Pit leaves Brenda more traumatized than she's willing to admit - especially when she must identify her attacker in a police lineup.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S02E026) David leads Brenda, Kelly, and Donna to the Bel Age Hotel on a mission to meet the pop group 'Color Me Badd' when they come to town.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S02E028) When the Taylor house suddenly floods from a ruptured water pipe, the Walshes reluctantly agree to host Mel and Jackie's wedding at theirs.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S03E001) Summer vacation begins and Brenda starts lying to her parents to see Dylan. Brandon starts his summer job at the Beach Club.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Tras la muerte de dos agentes encubiertos de la DEA y la desaparición de un tercero, el UAC se suma a la NSA para investigar si una red clandestina de drogas por Internet está involucrada.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: UAC está buscando a un sospechoso que tal vez esté fascinado por inquietantes experimentos médicos.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Luego de un evento que acontece cerca de casa, el equipo de NCIS se une para buscar respuestas y pedir justicia en pos de proteger a los colegas más vulnerables.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: El equipo de NCIS investiga el accidente de tránsito de un Marine y desata algunos tristes recuerdos de Abby cuando era una niña en búsqueda de rastros para resolver su "primer caso".

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: El equipo de NCIS atrapa a un reconocido pirata informático que puede darles la llave para encontrar al mayor ciber terrorista del mundo.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: El Director Vance, aún de luto por la pérdida de su mujer y la madre de sus hijos, descubre inesperada información personal que le generará dudas sobre absolutamente todo.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): A sangre fría
programme.desc: Cuando un teniente de la policía de Nueva York, recientemente retirado y bien considerado, es acusado de disparar a un grupo de posibles asaltantes en el metro y posteriormente desaparece, Frank debe enfrentar las consecuencias.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): El camino al infierno
programme.desc: Danny debe determinar quién asesinó a un hombre cuando varias mujeres que trabajaron para él se atribuyen el mérito.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Un nuevo comienzo
programme.desc: Erin se siente abrumada por la culpa después de que un hombre al que liberó es acusado de matar a un policía.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Ayúdame a ayudarte
programme.desc: Linda pide a Danny y Báez que ayuden a su compañera de trabajo, quien está teniendo problemas con su exmarido enfurecido.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: UAC está buscando a un sospechoso que tal vez esté fascinado por inquietantes experimentos médicos.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC implementa una estrategia elaborada para tratar de acabar con el anillo de sicarios “Los doce sucios”, con Reid jugando un papel central.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando se encuentran cuerpos en lugares públicos alrededor de Boston, el UAC investiga si un taxi o servicio de transporte que las víctimas utilizaron antes de su muerte podría guiar hasta el sospechoso.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC busca un móvil y un sospechoso cuando las víctimas se encuentran en los inodoros de las paradas de camiones a lo largo de las carreteras en todo el sur.

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: Steve Austin brings back 12 seasoned Redneck Island veterans and 12 eager new rookies to battle it out for $100,000. At the first challenge, the players dive into the competition as they fight it out to claim victory.

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: The game is turned on its head as one player quits the competition and another is seriously injured. The challenge turns physical as the teams fight to stay afloat.

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: The players must rise to the occasion as a daunting challenge pushes their limits to new heights. One of the veterans gets life-changing news from home. A powerful new alliance forms that changes the course of the game.

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: A budding romance between two teammates complicates their future in the game. The challenge forces the competitors to put their brains as well as their brawn to the test.

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: The power continues to shift in the game, raising the stakes to a new high as the teams brawl it out at the challenge. Old romantic flames reignite between Margaret and Josh.

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: The rival alliances divide the house as a new power-team emerges. The players have a tough time choking down what Steve is serving up at the challenge. Two best friends face off against each other in an emotional Pit.

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: The teams hang on for dear life as they fight for victory at the challenge. A wild night of fun leads to chaos when the party gets out of hand. A tough Pit decision threatens to tear friendships apart.

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: With the end and the money in sight, tensions are high and friendships are tested as the competitors' plot to stay in the game. It's a hard day on the lake as the teams struggle to pull off a crucial win.

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: With the finale just one challenge away, it's down to the wire and one small misstep may cost a team a shot at $100,000. Emotions are high as it all comes down to the last Pit. The final three teams are revealed.

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: The end has arrived and the strongest have survived. With everything on the line, the final three teams must push themselves harder than ever before as they compete in an epic final race.

programme.title: Bachelorette Weekend
programme.desc: The staff is skeptical of Robbie's new incentive program, Nicole plots revenge on JJ after he flakes on work, and a drunk bridesmaid wanders away from the party.

programme.title: Bachelorette Weekend
programme.desc: When a couple heads to Nashville for a joint bachelor-bachelorette party, the staff is put in charge of choosing a best man and juggling both the bride and groom's needs.

programme.title: Bachelorette Weekend
programme.desc: The staff pulls out all the stops for a patriotic party, Robbie confides in JJ that the company is in debt, and Liz and Rosa ignite a prank war.

programme.title: Bachelorette Weekend
programme.desc: Lack of communication leads to a waste of time and money and Robbie breaks out the Fun Bus when a limo scheduling mishap derails plans for a party of Broadway performers.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 04/21/2013. Anthony Bourdain visits Koreatown in Los Angeles, where he finds a tight-knit community marked by the 1992 Rodney King riots.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 04/28/2013. Colombia has changed immensely over the past 10 years. Anthony Bourdain explores several regions of the country, from the mountains down to the Caribbean coast.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 05/05/2013. Chefs and restauranteurs Fred Morin and Dave McMillan, of Joe Beef’s, take us across Canada by rail.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 05/12/2013. Anthony Bourdain explores the "Interzone,” where artists like Burroughs, Bowles and the Rolling Stones sought escape from Western moral prohibitions.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 05/19/2013. Anthony Bourdain explores Libyan hip-hop, Italian restaurants and post-war uncertainty, by examining the country through personal stories, food and music.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 06/02/2013. Bourdain and his friend, world-renowned chef Eric Ripert, move from hip, modern Lima back in time into pre-Columbian Peru.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 06/09/2013. Anthony Bourdain visits Congo, the setting of one of his favorite books, Conrad’s “Heart of Darkness.”

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 09/22/2013. Anthony Bourdain visits Andalucia during Semana Santa, Holy Week, to visit longtime director Zach Zamboni, who currently lives in Granada.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 04/14/2013. Anthony Bourdain explores one of the most fabled and beautiful areas of Asia: Myanmar, the city of Yangon and the remote Bagan temple.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 04/21/2013. Anthony Bourdain visits Koreatown in Los Angeles, where he finds a tight-knit community marked by the 1992 Rodney King riots.

programme.title: Soundtracks
programme.desc: Aired 04/20/2017. Exploring the music that kept the spirit of the civil rights movement alive following Martin Luther King Jr.’s death.

programme.title: Soundtracks
programme.desc: Aired 04/27/2017. In the wake of the 9/11 attacks, songs about New York have heightened meaning, while politically-charged country music takes center stage.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 09/29/2013. With a combination of cultures, New Mexico has the largest Hispanic population per capita in the US. Go with Anthony Bourdain as he explores.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 10/06/2013. Home to chef Rene Redzepi of Noma, Copenhagen is known as the cultural center of Denmark. Anthony Bourdain explores its fantastic food and natural beauty.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 10/13/2013. Anthony Bourdain visits Sicily, where he goes fishing for his supper and sets out to find a home-cooked meal.

programme.title: The History of Comedy
programme.desc: Aired 2/9/2017. Tracking the evolution of inappropriate humor throughout history, showcasing the work from groundbreaking comedians who risked their careers, prison sentences, and even their lives as they fought against censorship.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A defiant motorist is shocked when his mother sides with the law, and deputies discover a man wearing a bizarre costume during a routine traffic stop.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers give chase to a suspect on a bike. A vehicle is pulled over and a passenger is arrested for possession of drug paraphernalia. Police are given a classic "I'm holding it for a friend" excuse.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers step in when a man's erratic behavior sparks concern in a neighborhood, and a wanted suspect is convinced an officer told him to take off on his bicycle.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A sibling reluctantly called authorities when his belligerent brother refused to leave his mother's home. Officers respond to a shoplifting call at a local grocery store. Officers investigate a suspicious vehicle parked at a local gas station.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A driver leaves her car during a routine traffic stop, officers stop a car that appears to have fake tags, and police respond to an altercation between a father and son.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A dangerous high-speed pursuit quickly comes to a head after the driver loses control. In Florida a man is pulled over in a stolen vehicle and asserts the car belongs to his parents. Arrests are made in a Florida prostitute sting.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man apologizes profusely after leading an officer on a foot chase, a passenger in a car chase tells conflicting tales, and police find a wanted man on a roof.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers respond to a call that a man shot up his parents' house, a fleeing suspect hopes a change of clothes will fool the police, and a shaky hit-and-run story unravels.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers dress a naked man who is causing a disturbance, a barefoot man denies evading police, and an intoxicated woman and her husband tell two different stories.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man weaves a stolen motorbike through traffic at high speeds as he tries to evade police. Deputies examine the aftermath of a violent domestic argument. A mom and dad deny that their habits could affect their child.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Suspects lead officers on a reckless car chase on residential streets. Police tend to a woman assaulted by her inebriated friend. A DWI suspect is found relieving himself in a public port-a-potty.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man's addiction forces his family to call the police for help, a driver abandons his car and tries to evade officers on foot, and a man tries to conceal his illegal stash.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers set up a sting designed to capture unsuspecting bicycle thieves. An Officer conducts a routine traffic stop on a vehicle with fraudulent tags. An officer pulls over a vehicle after observing a suspected prostitute enter the vehicle.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A very cooperative car thief tells deputies all about his good fortune. An argument over business leaves one man on the ground with a bloody mouth. The occupants of a truck are oblivious to what deputies find in the backseat.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A patrolman pursues a scooter speeding through a neighborhood, officers try to subdue a raving man, and a woman has issues with her neighbor's dogs.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man receives an enormous break due to public health concerns. Officers are doubtful when two friends claim they were unaware of each other’s actions. Police pull over a car full of people who know very little about themselves.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police investigate suspicious activity in a known drug area, officers encounter a jaywalker with the munchies, and a woman caught with meth wants points for honesty.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police question the legitimacy of the name a driver gives them. Both husband and wife protect each other in a case of domestic violence. A 12-year friendship is jeopardized when a woman suspects her roommate of stealing.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A bloodied man prowls around an apartment complex. Officers pull over a suspicious vehicle and seize drugs belonging to a passenger who is arrested. Police seize drugs and a large knife from a bicyclist.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An officer pursues an unruly bicyclist, a man ducks into a drive-through in an attempt to elude police, and a deputy pulls over a stolen vehicle driven by a repeat offender.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An officer tackles a masked man with an outstanding warrant, an erratic driver is stopped driving to a nail salon, and police respond to a domestic assault involving hot wax.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police track a possible stolen vehicle, a man upset with his neighbors takes matters into his own hands, and officers try to placate a man holding a knife to his own throat.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police catch up to a man with warrants and a history of resisting arrest, a fidgety driver arouses suspicion, and a minor with beers in his pants has to answer to his mom.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man in hiding is sniffed out quickly by the K-9 unit, a couple gets caught lying when an officer recognizes them, and a woman's dogs save her a trip to jail.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Deputies respond to an armed carjacking, an altercation leads to a woman's arrest, and officers face a combative man.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A neighborhood search ends with the suspect in a stranger's home, a pastor calls about a suspicious car parked behind his church, and a deputy gives advice to a young mother.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A wanted man attempts to hide at his grandmother's house, police arrest a suspect driving a stolen vehicle, and officers call animal control for an injured dog.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and his team investigate two murders that take place at the annual bull riding rodeo in Las Vegas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and his team battle the flu when they are called upon by DDA Klein to investigate the deaths of several key witnesses for a grand jury case against a dangerous Las Vegas gang.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The disturbing death of a 3-year-old girl has a great impact on Catherine as she searches for clues to her murder.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Brass and Nick get help from an unlikely source, an incarcerated criminal (Method Man), when investigating two murders that take place in the same apartment building.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and his team discover several victims who have green blood, leading them to the conclusion that their deaths are somehow connected.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and the CSI team become involved in the world of Hollywood comedy when a diva sitcom star (Sagal) meets an untimely demise while filming her show in Las Vegas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Warrick is accused of murdering a famous Vegas gangster, and even he is uncertain of his guilt or innocence.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Gil Grissom is the supervisor of the graveyard shift of Las Vegas' elite crime scene investigators. Holly Gribbs, fresh out of the academy, joins the team.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A man is killed after winning a fortune and then dumping his girlfriend. So, Grissom, Nick, and newcomer to the CSI team, Sara Sidle, investigate this one.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom, Nick, and Sara search for a kidnapped woman and find more than they expected. Catherine and Warrick investigate the hit-and-run death of a little girl.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and Catherine investigate when a leg is found severed from a body in a lake. Meanwhile, Sara and Nick investigate a fraternity pledging gone terribly wrong.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and Warrick take the case of a young man who is found naked in the desert without an obvious cause of death.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Catherine violates department protocol when she takes the case of a rape accusation against her ex-husband. Warrick and Sara search for the missing bullet that will either exonerate or indict a cop for murder.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When a teenager and her sister are the sole survivors of the gruesome murder of four members of one family in a quiet suburban neighborhood, Grissom and his entire team investigate the crime.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Warrick es acusado de asesinar a un famoso gángster de Las Vegas e incluso él no está seguro de su culpabilidad o inocencia.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Gil Grissom es el supervisor del turno de noche de los investigadores de élite de la escena del crimen de Las Vegas. Holly Gribbs, recién salida de la academia, se une al equipo.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Un hombre es asesinado después de haber ganado una fortuna y haber dejado a su novia. Entonces, Grissom, Nick y la recién llegada al equipo de CSI, Sara Sidle, investigan este caso.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom, Nick y Sara buscan a una mujer secuestrada y encuentran más de lo que esperaban. Catherine y Warrick investigan la muerte por atropello con fuga de una niña.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom y Catherine investigan la aparición de una pierna cortada de un cuerpo en un lago. Mientras tanto, Sara y Nick investigan un juramento de fraternidad que ha salido terriblemente mal.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom y Warrick toman el caso de un joven que es descubierto desnudo en el desierto sin una causa obvia de muerte.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Catherine viola el protocolo del departamento cuando acepta el caso de una acusación de violación contra su exmarido. Warrick y Sara buscan la bala perdida que exonerará o acusará a un policía de asesinato.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando una adolescente y su hermana son las únicas supervivientes del espantoso asesinato de cuatro miembros de una familia en un tranquilo barrio suburbano, Grissom y todo su equipo investigan el crimen.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Royce Harmon fue asesinado hace 3 meses en una escena montada para que pareciera un suicidio. Ahora se ha producido otro asesinato.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom y su equipo investigan la muerte de un pasajero de primera clase en un vuelo a Las Vegas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom y Sara investigan un cuerpo plagado de bichos encontrado en el desierto. Warrick y Catherine investigan el robo de unas valiosas obras de arte.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Una mujer es secuestrada en un supermercado. En la tienda, Grissom encuentra la puerta de un baño que dice que cinco mujeres han sido asesinadas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Un preso condenado a muerte manda un video pidiendo ayuda a Gil, afirmando que es inocente de la muerte de su mujer y su hijo, Gill acepta el caso y con la ayuda de Sara y de Warrick intenta averiguar lo que de verdad sucedió en la casa.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Una bomba explota en un edificio de oficinas matando a una persona e hiriendo a muchas más. El principal sospechoso es un guardia de seguridad que se marchó minutos antes de la explosión y que tiene conocimiento en la fabricación de bombas.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Three people are shot and killed in downtown Miami during rush hour and Horatio and the team must catch the killer fast.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A professor from a local university is found hanging from a tree after being tortured, she had been tortured for at least 4 hours before the hanging.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When an unidentified girl is found dead near a very strict rehabilitation camp, Horatio and the team investigate her murder.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio and the team are called to investigate when a prostitute is found stabbed to death and stuffed under a bed after the body was cleaned.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When it's revealed that a ring of underground labs are manufacturing deadly drugs, Horatio and Speedle investigate the situation.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio and Speedle investigate when a burglar and rapist has been sexually assaulted and taped to his bedposts after being suffocated to death.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio and the team are exposed to radiation while investigating a murder, which leads them to an environmental lawyer dying of radiation poisoning.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio and the team are called to investigate the murder of an eastern European immigrant stabbed to death in a peep show booth.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio and his team race to find new evidence for a murder trial already underway in order to avoid the conviction of a possibly innocent man.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: It was supposed to be a routine undercover trip to the incinerator to dispose of drug evidence, but the police officers are ambushed.
