programme.desc: Existe la forma correcta, la forma equivocada y la forma del ejército. Pero bajo ninguna circunstancia, el investigador militar Paul Brenner ayudará a los oficiales de Fort MacCallum a encubrir el motivo de la muerte de una hermosa oficial.

programme.title: Seis grados de separación
programme.desc: Haciéndose pasar por el hijo de un famoso actor, un joven desconocido (Will Smith) entra hábilmente en el mundo elitista de los marchantes de arte (Stockard Channing, Donald Sutherland) y pone en marcha algo que cambiará sus vidas para siempre.

programme.title: Un plan sencillo
programme.desc: Dos hermanos encuentran cuatro millones de dólares en una avioneta caída e intentan quedarse con el dinero, pero la paranoia, la codicia y el miedo a ser capturado hacen que su plan esté fuera de control, con consecuencias desastrosas.

programme.title: The Lookout
programme.desc: Chris "Slapshot" Pratt (Joseph Gordon-Levitt), cuyo brillante futuro fue cortado por un accidente, es un conserje nocturno en un banco. Solitario y frustrado, Chris cae en las garras de un estafador y lo ayuda a robar el banco donde trabaja.

programme.title: Fuimos héroes
programme.desc: En 1965, Estados Unidos está en guerra con Vietnam del Norte, y el teniente coronel Hal Moore prepara a sus tropas para una de las batallas más violentas de la historia de EE. UU.: “El valle de la muerte”.

programme.title: Bailando con lobos
programme.desc: Enviado para proteger un puesto fronterizo de Estados Unidos, el teniente John Dunbar se hace amigo de aquellos que él pensaba que tenía que temerle, los indios Sioux.

programme.title: The Curious Case Of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: Brad Pitt y Cate Blanchett protagonizan esta adaptación de la historia de F. Scott Fitzgerald acerca de un anciano que va rejuveneciendo y los problemas que surgen cuando se enamora de una mujer.

programme.title: Sólo una noche
programme.desc: La historia de un matrimonio que se enfrenta a la tentación que puede decidir su futuro cuando se encuentran separados durante una sola noche.

programme.title: Sin embargo... es adorable
programme.desc: John Travolta se une a Sean Penn y Robin Wright en una película divertida, moderna y sobrecargada de emociones. Donde una mujer cuya pasión por dos hombres, completamente opuestos da como resultado un triángulo amoroso escandaloso y explosivo.

programme.title: Showgirls: lo prohibido
programme.desc: Conflictos de seducción, pasión y poder se revelan cuando los creadores de 'Instinto Básico' destapan el aparentemente glamoroso mundo del espectáculo en Las Vegas con esta controvertida película protagonizada por Elizabeth Berkley.

programme.title: A Month By The Lake
programme.desc: Una huésped encantadora en el resort cerca del lago Como tiene el ojo puesto en un simpático y adinerado soltero y hace todo los posible por capturar a su hombre adinerado.

programme.title: Mi difunto novio
programme.desc: Una mujer descubre la verdad sobre su novio después de que lo encuentra muerto en su casa.

programme.title: About Adam
programme.desc: Cuando la despreocupada Lucy (Kate Hudson) al fin conoce a su hombre perfecto, Adam (Stuart Townsend), está lista para sentar cabeza de verdad. Pero mientras Lucy está ocupada planeando la boda, Adam está ocupado ¡encantando al resto de su familia!

programme.title: Peligro en Bangkok
programme.desc: Joe (Nicolas Cage) es un asesino profesional que aterriza en Bangkok para ocuparse de unas obligaciones y se encuentra inesperadamente entrenando a un joven protegido y enamorándose de una mujer que desconoce su verdadero trabajo.

programme.title: A contrarreloj
programme.desc: En este fascinante thriller, el jefe de Policía (Denzel Washington) de una pequeña ciudad, se ve inmerso en graves problemas al investigar el asesinato de una mujer con la que mantenía una relación en secreto porque todas las pruebas apuntan a él.

programme.title: Un crimen inesperado
programme.desc: El hijo de un oficial de la policía de Nueva York asesinado se une a la fuerza y cae en línea con el ex compañero de su padre, y un equipo de policías deshonestos.

programme.title: Peligro en Bangkok
programme.desc: Joe (Nicolas Cage) es un asesino profesional que aterriza en Bangkok para ocuparse de unas obligaciones y se encuentra inesperadamente entrenando a un joven protegido y enamorándose de una mujer que desconoce su verdadero trabajo.

programme.title: La suburban dorada
programme.desc: Un policía judicial es acusado de estar relacionado con el narcotráfico solo por ayudar a su primo. Las circunstancias lo convierten en un fugitivo de la ley y por recuperar a su hijo tiene que involucrase con el narcotráfico.

programme.title: Respeto (2012)
programme.desc: Lucas comienza un romance con Jasmine sin saber que antes anduvo con Jacob, uno de sus amigos. Tras sentirse traicionado, Jacob delata a Lucas con el hermanastro de Jasmine y solo provoca la ira entre pandillas.

programme.title: Terminator: El exterminador
programme.desc: En 2029, las super-computadoras dominan el planeta y buscan exterminar la raza humana. Para ello, mandan de regreso en el tiempo a un indestructible cyborg con la misión de matar a Sarah Connor, cuyo hijo se convertirá en la esperanza de la humanidad.

programme.title: Ejecutor
programme.desc: Despedido hace algún tiempo del FBI, Mark Kaminsky se pone en contacto con su anterior jefe, Shannon, cuyo hijo ha sido asesinado. Decidido a encontrar al asesino, Shannon necesita la ayuda de Kaminsky y se ofrece a reincorporarlo si tiene éxito.

programme.title: Compadres
programme.desc: Un policía mexicano y un joven americano hacker de computadores, unen fuerzas para entregar un criminal a la justicia en esta comedia de acción llena de altas emociones y risas escandalosas.

programme.title: Tod@s caen
programme.desc: Tras su éxito en la taquillera pelicula No Manches Frida 2, Omar Chaparro y Martha Higared llegan a la gran pantalla con la divertidísima comedia romántica TODOS CAEN.

programme.title: El infierno
programme.desc: Benny ha sido deportado de los Estados Unidos a México, que está siendo destrozado por las guerras de los carteles de droga. Luego se involucra en el negocio del narcotráfico y comienza a subir de rango.

programme.title: No eres tú, soy yo
programme.desc: Después de la ruptura de su reciente matrimonio, Javier se encuentra en una depresión de la que ni siquiera un psiquiatra puede ayudarlo a salir. Sin embargo, la esperanza está en camino en la forma improbable de sus exnovias.

programme.title: La habitación
programme.desc: Ocho historias que ocurren en la misma habitación en diferentes períodos de la historia mexicana.

programme.title: Perfectos desconocidos
programme.desc: Cuando un grupo de mejores amigos se reúne durante un eclipse lunar para compartir una cena íntima en la elegante casa de Eva y Antonio, sospechan que se trata de otra noche cualquiera hasta que la anfitriona les propone un juego.

programme.title: Mimic
programme.desc: Del director ganador del Óscar, Guillermo del Toro (THE SHAPE OF WATER), llega una batalla, el hombre y la naturaleza. El milagro de la ingeniería creado en el laboratorio evolucionó y comenzó a imitar al depredador más peligroso de todos: el humano.

programme.title: Caso 39
programme.desc: Renée Zellweger, ganadora de un Oscar, protagoniza la película de suspenso sobrenatural de una trabajadora social, que tiene asignado el raro e inquietante caso de Lillith Sullivan, una niña con un extraño y misterioso pasado.

programme.title: El último exorcismo: Parte II
programme.desc: Nell está de nuevo en la seguridad de la civilización y es enviada a vivir en una casa de acogida, donde se la anima a dejar atrás su pasado e iniciar una nueva vida.

programme.title: Terrifier (LAS)
programme.desc: Art el payaso regresa y pone su mirada en tres mujeres jóvenes, junto con cualquiera que se meta en su camino.

programme.title: Portadores
programme.desc: Chris Pine protagoniza este intenso y cautivante thriller, Portadores. Es la terrorífica historia de cuatro adolescentes que descubren que son más peligrosos para sí mismos que el virus global mortal del que intentan escapar.

programme.title: Mimic 2
programme.desc: Una mutación de cucarachas asesinas sorprende a la ciudad de Nueva York. Se crean imitaciones para infiltrar su grupo y acabar con ellas, pero estas evolucionan y se transforman en seres humanos para seguir acabando con la humanidad.

programme.title: Mimic 3: sentinel
programme.desc: Los bichos están de regreso en la tercera parte de Mimic. Después de que un grupo de personas comienzan a desaparecer, un hombre hipersensible a los gérmenes y confinado a una burbuja protectora pretende ser detective y descifrar el fenómeno.

programme.title: Estación zombi
programme.desc: Una desgarradora película de terror y suspenso zombi, que sigue a un grupo de pasajeros aterrorizados que se abren camino a través de un brote viral en todo el país.

programme.title: El dictador
programme.desc: Los creadores y las estrellas de Borat traen esta asombrosa comedia sobre lo que pasa cuando el peor dictador del mundo llega a los Estados Unidos ¡Prepárate para llorar de risa con esta comedia delirante y bochornosamente divertida!

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Jack Black encarna el papel más gracioso como Ignacio, un cocinero de monasterio que alimenta huérfanos de día y por las noches se transforma en Nacho Libre, un notorio luchador en calzas.

programme.title: Isuper Secreto!
programme.desc: La estrella de rock estadounidense Nick Rivers se enfrenta al temido Alto Mando de Alemania Oriental. En una carrera contra el tiempo, Nick ayuda a Hillary a buscar a su padre.

programme.title: South Park: Más grande, más larga y sin censura
programme.desc: Stan, Kyle, Kenny y Cartman ven una película prohibida para menores que les deforma sus frágiles cabezas. Sus padres no tardan en declarar la guerra a Canadá y los chicos son la última esperanza que tiene Estados Unidos para frenar el Armagedón.

programme.title: Sin rumbo
programme.desc: Seth Green, Matthew Lillard y Dax Shepard actúan en esta comedia como amigos de la infancia que se han alejado, pero deben reunirse ante la repentina muerte de su cuarto amigo.

programme.title: Ocho cabezas
programme.desc: Tommy Spinelli (Joe Pesci) viaja a San Diego para entregar una bolsa de ocho ‘antiguos socios’ a un jefe mafioso enojado, pero cuando un compañero de viaje por error toma el bolso, las cabezas van a México!

programme.title: De fiesta en las alturas
programme.desc: Un elenco estelar, que incluye a Tom Arnold, Kevin Hart, Method Man y Snoop Dogg se apodera de los cielos en esta irreverente comedia sobre una aerolínea que ofrece sensuales sobrecargos, casino y el antro de moda a ¡10,000 metros de altura!

programme.title: La chica de rojo
programme.desc: Cuando Teddy se cruza con una mujer que usa un provocativo vestido de seda rojo, descubre que ella es la modelo elegida por su agencia para una nueva campaña. Desde entonces, el sueño de Teddy será tener un romance con ella.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven (1960)
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: One Eyed Jacks
programme.desc: Marlon Brando’s only time as a Directo, Rio (Marlon Brando) also called "The Kid", his mentor Dad Longworth (Karl Malden), & a third man called Doc, rob a bank of two saddlebags of gold in Sonora, Mexico.

programme.title: Red River
programme.desc: John Wayne, Montgomery Clift and Walter Brennan give stellar performances in Howard Hawks' epic masterpiece as a self-made cattle baron (Wayne) and his adopted son (Clift) risk everything to drive their herd across the treacherous Chisholm Trail.

programme.title: Duel at Diablo
programme.desc: Frontier scout Jess Remsberg leads a wagon train through hostile territory to Fort Conchos. But underneath his valor, he has an ulterior motive: to settle a score with the man he believes killed his wife. James Garner and Sidney Poitier star.

programme.title: Vera Cruz
programme.desc: In this epic Western, two shady mercenaries (Gary Cooper, Burt Lancaster) in Mexico during the 1866 revolution are hired to escort a Countess and her gold to the Mexican army in Vera Cruz and find themselves at odds with the army…and each other!

programme.title: Invitation to a Gunfighter
programme.desc: Screen legend Yul Brynner turns in a magnificent performance as a gunfighter who must do battle with his most formidable adversary - his own conscience - in this gripping, double-barreled western full of surprise twists and colorful villainy.

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dynamite
programme.desc: The results are explosive when an Irish terrorist (James Coburn) with a dynamite obsession teams up with a Mexican peasant-turned-revolutionary (Rod Steiger) in this action-packed tale of power and politics. Directed by the legendary Sergio Leone.

programme.title: It's A Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World
programme.desc: Spencer Tracy leads a hilariously zany cast of Hollywood's greatest comedians (including Milton Berle, Sid Caesar, Ethel Merman and Mickey Rooney) as eight vacation-bound motorists set off on a mad-cap, side-splitting race to find a stolen fortune!

programme.title: Yours, Mine, and Ours
programme.desc: When widowed nurse Helen North (Lucille Ball) meets widower Frank Beardsley (Henry Fonda), a population explosion takes place as her eight kids blend (or don't) with his ten in this chaotic, classic comedy! Van Johnson and Tom Bosley co-star.

programme.title: Funny Face
programme.desc: Paris, the City of Light, shines even brighter when Audrey Hepburn and Fred Astaire team up for the only time and bring their luminous starpower to this exquisite musical featuring songs by George and Ira Gershwin.

programme.title: That Touch of Mink
programme.desc: Love arrives with a splash when a handsome and eligible tycoon and a beautiful working woman meet over a curbside mud puddle. He’s enchanted by her small town ways, she’s captivated by his romantic, debonair manner.

programme.title: Marty
programme.desc: Ernest Borgnine won a Best Actor Oscar for his role as a Bronx butcher who gives up on love, until he meets an equally lonely school teacher in this charming story that garnered a total of four Oscars including Best Picture.

programme.title: Sweet Smell of Success
programme.desc: A columnist and a press agent tear into the maelstrom of midtown Manhattan's night creatures in a sinister game that involves money, power and ultimately survival.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: Gomer's love for Welsh rarebit causes him to sleepwalk -- and to tell off Carter.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: A club owner wants Gomer to sing every night.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: Carter volunteers Gomer for a parachute jump.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: The highways in Hooterville are in dire need of repair. Oliver is fed up and believes he can make a difference by complaining to his state representative, Ben Hanks. But Hanks' popularity proves greater than his sense of responsibility.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Lisa feels like she should be contributing more and wants to start working in Oliver's construction business. Lisa is like a fish out of water as she arrives to the Monroes' workshop in overalls and causes one problem after another.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Lisa plays bovine matchmaker when Oliver and Lisa decide it is time for their female cow, Eleanor, to start providing milk for the farm. Oliver makes arrangements for Eleanor to mooooove in with the neighbor's bull, but Lisa has other ideas.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: The townsfolk look forward to 'Old Mail Day', when once a year undelivered mail is handed out. The delayed mail includes a letter all the way from 1917! Oliver is upset by the poor service, but his complaints land with more impact than he intended.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: When word spreads that an agricultural student is coming to Hooterville to study with county agent Hank Kimball, no one seems to be interested. However, things change when the folks discover that the student is an attractive blonde.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: This episode tells the unusual tale of Hooterville's founding. As the town prepares for its centennial, Oliver announces a reenactment of the town's origins and casts himself and Lisa in the roles of Horace and Doris Hooter.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: When a blue feather arrives in the mail for Lisa, her Hungarian roots tell her that trouble is brewing. The feather is a symbol of malfortune to come, and she suspects it was sent by Hungarian gypsies, a warning that they are out to get her.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Don't count chickens before they hatch! Oliver thinks he's laid a gold egg of an idea when he decides to dive beak first into the business of raising chickens. Lisa, on the other hand, sees little difference between raising chickens and children.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: All that glitters is not frosted cereal. After a jewelry heist in Chicago, the robbers foolishly stash their booty in the grain bin of a cereal manufacturer. Oliver and Lisa discover the jewels in their bowl of Crickly Wickly!

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Oliver Wendell Douglas returns from farm to firm... law firm, that is. When a young and ambitious local graduates from law school, he looks for a potential partner in Hooterville. Oliver is the logical choice. Lisa and Eb help the new venture.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: After partnering with a young, local lawyer, Oliver has opened a new law office in Hooterville. However, their secretary, Lisa, shows a lack of necessary skills. Soon, Lisa's job is on the line, even if she is married to one of the partners.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: When the Young Peoples Agricultural Society holds their annual convention in Washington, D.C., local members Eb, Mr. Kimball, and Arnold the pig get ready to make the big trip. Oliver and Lisa serve as unintended chaperones.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: Edith stops by the Jeffersons home to say goodbye to her dear friend, Louise. It seems that George his struck it big with his dry cleaning business and has decided to 'move on up to the East side, to a deluxe apartment in the sky.'

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: While at work, Archie is in a near fatal accident when a large crate nearly crushes him. This near death experience leads Archie to suddenly become a devout if somewhat hypocritical churchgoer.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: In a crooked attempt to buy the building next to his cleaning store, George Jefferson has decided to run for a position on the Republican county commission and needs Archie to sign a petition.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: The Bunker home gets a visit by a fast talking furnace inspector who cons Archie into signing a contract to purchase two-thousand dollars worth of aluminim siding.

programme.title: Maude
programme.desc: Maude forces Vivian to attend the funeral of a 'dear friend' they both hated, and the ordeal is worsened by a revelation in the 'Unending Slumber Room.'

programme.title: Maude
programme.desc: Maude begins to panic when she finds herself locked in a file closet with a highly incompatible person...her ex-husband Chester.

programme.title: Maude
programme.desc: Mrs. Naugatuck is upset after her wedding plans hit a snag, and a well-meaning offer from Maude makes a bad situation unbearable. Luckily, Carol's sensitivity gives Mrs. Naugatuck a shoulder to cry on.

programme.title: Maude
programme.desc: Walter's worries over a business loan ruin his vacation, and then he receives word that may ruin his life.

programme.title: Maude
programme.desc: Walter is in the depths of despair after losing his appliance store to bankruptcy, and Maude's efforts to improve his mental disposition result in disaster.

programme.title: Maude
programme.desc: An apprehensive Maude visits Walter the day after his suicide attempt, and learns of some complications that may delay his return home, on the conclusion of a three-part episode.

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: Bobby faces a humorous predicament when it becomes obvious that one of the biggest talent managers in New York is representing him because of his prowess as a lover, and not for his ability as an actor.

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: In a protest against unsafe equipment, the cabbies go on strike, and Louie offers an unusual solution to the problem to shop steward Elaine.

programme.title: In The Heat Of The Night
programme.desc: Chief Gillespie's personal relationship with Harriet DeLong is tested when her ex-husband Vic Glendon is caught committing an armed robbery, and her son Eugene is suspected of being involved when some of the stolen money is found in his possession.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Former underworld figure Vincent Kauoli returns from the dead to regain control of crime syndicate, but photographer snaps photo. Kauoli & thugs want to destroy film & photographer.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Daughter of organized crime leader betrays father by stealing $10m, aide blackmails daughter by exposing treachery to father.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Paraplegic ex-con Nathan Sarge Purdy becomes sniper, shoots down police officers. McGarrett analyzes MO & evidence of killer's physical strength to find leads.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Impressionist Rich Little depicts the self-appointed avenger of a girl who, after kicking her drug habit, is turned on to it again by a pusher and, consequently, dies from an overdose.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: McGarrett is framed as prime suspect in his girlfriend's murder, evidence against him is strong, including bullets fired from his service revolver.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Working with a Tokyo police officer, Five-O's Steve McGarrett tries to locate the source of a gun smuggling ring which is sending handguns to Japan.

programme.title: The Streets of San Francisco
programme.desc: Keller infiltrates a group of Vietnam War protesters, hoping to find who murdered an AWOL marine.

programme.title: The Streets of San Francisco
programme.desc: An innocent man isn't worried about a new murder charge against him, but he is afraid that once the police process his fingerprints, they will learn that he is a fugitive from a 25-year-old homicide investigation.

programme.title: The Streets of San Francisco
programme.desc: When five terrorists whose plan to pass through a security checkpoint at a boating dock fails, they flee taking on several hostages including Inspector Steve Keller.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: Mannix uncovers an unsolved homicide while protecting a controversial writer.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: An art collector sees a woman modelling for a sculptor who looks exactly like the subject of his Renoir painting but she flees so he hires Intertect and Mannix to find her.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: A deaf woman "overhears" a portion of a kidnapping/murder plot. Mannix tries to determine the victim's identity and whereabouts before the time limit to pay the ransom.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: Charlie Anderson, a retired policeman who once saved Joe Mannix's life, hires him when his wife has run away. The wife is someone Charlie met while on active duty - she'd been a prostitute who went straight.

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder
programme.desc: With the latest murder on TV taking place at Community General, Dr. Sloan, Steve, Jesse, and Amanda prepare to solve this case and protect their integrity.

programme.title: Kung Fu
programme.desc: Kwai Chang Caine (David Carradine), a half-American Buddhist monk from China, restores the eyes and faith of a phony preacher (John Carradine), blinded by Indians, and finds his own roots in America.

programme.title: Kung Fu
programme.desc: In Arizona Territory, the half-American Buddhist monk, Kwai Chang Caine (DAVID CARRADINE), attempts to arrest the killers of a young man with whom he grew up in a Chinese temple. Robert Urich guest stars.

programme.title: Kung Fu
programme.desc: Caine (DAVID CARRADINE), the half-American Buddhist monk from China, wandering the American West as a hunted fugitive, teaches forgiveness to an old man and his daughter after a rape has led to double tragedy.

programme.title: Kung Fu
programme.desc: Caine (DAVID CARRADINE) escapes from a mantrap and is caught in a far more dangerous snare, this one set by a beautiful woman. Mako guest stars.

programme.title: The Outer Limits: 1963
programme.desc: Robert Duvall stars as a CIA agent sent on a mission to infiltrate a downed spacecraft and kill the creatures inside. Mutated to appear as they do, he soon learns that the shape in which a man finds his own humanity is not always a human one.

programme.title: The Outer Limits: 1963
programme.desc: Vera Miles and Barbara Rush star as two women who kill a ruthless blackmailer. Fleeing from their crime, they stumble across an eccentric inventor (David McCallum) obsessed with returning the dead to life….including the man the women murdered.

programme.title: The Outer Limits: 1963
programme.desc: In Harlan Ellison's first-ever science fiction teleplay, Michael Ansara portrays a man born and bred to be a killing machine who finds himself without war when a time warp sends him from future earth to the present day. Lloyd Nolan also stars.

programme.title: The Outer Limits: 1963
programme.desc: Star Trek's William Shatner stars as the first man to successfully land on Venus. But when he suddenly starts craving heat -- more heat than humans can stand -- it is just the beginning of a nightmare brought back from The Outer Limits.

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder
programme.desc: Steve assigns Amy Devlin and Taylor Lucas, two police officers from the Vice Squad, to assist in solving the homicide of local pimp Milton Wilder. However, Taylor convinces her partner to take a temporary detour on their way to the investigation.

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder
programme.desc: The new attending physician, Kate Delibe, is causing a stir at Community General with her unorthodox methods of care. Delibe assists terminally ill patient George Dugan's suicide against Dr. Sloan's wishes.

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder
programme.desc: As Lou Summers heads to the comedy club to host Mark's Man of the Year Roast, a driver in a nearby car shoots at him and misses, but Lou doesn't hear it because his hearing aids aren't on.

programme.title: The Fugitive
programme.desc: Richard Kimble is forced to defy hurricane warnings to transport a couple from the mainland to the Florida Keys.

programme.title: The Fugitive
programme.desc: Richard Kimble happens to be in the background when a sidewalk photographer snaps some newlyweds and it leads to concentrated trouble.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: Mama becomes jealous when Iola spends all her time with her new best friend, Arlene. But she soon discovers that Arlene can hardly wait to get the clinging Iola out of her life.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: The Harpers are chosen as the "typical American family" to be visited by Olga, a "typical Russian homemaker," who not only cleans their house inside and out but also decides to stay.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: A disappointed Bubba refuses to go to his graduation when he learns his parents will not be there. Mama, the valedictorian and speaker for the commencement, won't go without him, and they both nearly miss the ceremony.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: When Mama overreacts to Bubba coming home drunk, he learns that he has triggered painful memories for Mama of an embarrassing "drunken" incident with Eunice.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: When Bubba's date for the prom cancels at the last minute, Mama, unbeknownst to him, fixes him up with Iola's shy, homely niece Vernette.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: When Naomi loses her memory, Mama takes advantage of her condition to turn her into the perfect housewife, much to the dismay of the rest of the family.

programme.title: Married... With Children
programme.desc: Al's Dodge goes into the car wash, but doesn't come out.

programme.title: Married... With Children

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When Tristan asks Mr. Yates for some writing help for his MC gig, Mr. Yates suggests he come to his apartment for some extra help. Imogen crushes hard on Jack and is determined to prove she can “roll” with her crowd.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Tristan is warned by Mr. Yates to make his feelings about their affair less obvious at school but Tristan can’t help it, he’s beaming.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Zoë's trial begins and when she fears that she is being painted in a harsh light, she takes matters into her own hands. Becky is torn up about what she’s going to say when she takes the stand as a character witness in her brother’s trial.

programme.desc: Will a superstorm headed for Toronto stall a Degrassi dance? Maya, Zig & Zoë plan to attend but get stranded at the Matlin house.

programme.title: Living with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: David Attenborough learns that descendants of the dinosaur age are alive and well. David explores how they survived the catastrophes that wiped out other species.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: Exploring the newfound remains of a dinosaur species considered the biggest carnivore in history, all while posing the question whether they engaged in a fight against the Argentinasaurus.

programme.title: Attenborough and the Giant Dinosaur
programme.desc: David Attenborough tells the story of the discovery and reconstruction in Argentina of the world's largest known dinosaur, a brand new species of titanosaur. Measuring 37m long, it now holds the record as the biggest animal ever to walk the earth.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve is going large as he focuses on the biggest animals to have ever walked the earth. In his dino-den, he starts by meeting the Argentinosaurus, an animal so large that even its poo was deadly.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: The Jurassic was home to the most vicious and violent predators the world has ever seen. To survive, herbivores had to fight back. Steve Backshall goes on a mission to track down the deadliest of all dinosaur defenders.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve tries to chomp through a car like a T-rex, wield an axe like an Allosaurus and hitch a ride in Britain's biggest tank to showcase the might of a Spinosaurus.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve gets freaky on a mission to find the weirdest dinosaur ever. He kick-starts with a Gigantoraptor, an 8 metre tall giant that laid the biggest eggs in history.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve discovers just what it takes to be a terror from the skies. He straps himself into one of Britain's fastest wind tunnels where he goes head to head against Microraptor.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve travels to new depths as he discovers just what it takes to be an aquatic terror. His quest sees him rocket through water in spectacular style, just like an Opthalmosaurus.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve's on a mission to find dinosaurs that have something a little special: fearsome killers, with incredible abilities! Get ready for a sensory sensation! His quest sees him race in the dark like a Troodon.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve goes on an undercover mission to unearth the sneakiest dinosaurs that were far deadlier than they first appeared.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve Backshall is on the hunt for the most deadly animals to have ever walked the earth, dinosaurs. Steve goes on a mission to uncover what was deadlier than the dinosaurs, from monsoons and super-sized sandstorms to ballistic bacteria and gory gas.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve Backshall looks back at the most awesome experiments over the series and chooses his highlights.

programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: A surprising natural history of the Grand Canyon, from dinosaurs to today.

programme.title: The Mystery of Rome's X Tomb
programme.desc: Dr Michael Scott investigates the secrets of a tomb containing over 2,000 bodies in one of the catacombs of Rome.

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: While trying to capture a Utahraptor on the loose in a shopping mall, Cutter's gun jams and the raptor escapes.

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: Jenny Lewis, a cynical PR guru, joins Cutter and the team but is horrified when she gets a taste of the new job.

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: Cutter and the team investigate when a young man is found savaged to death at an adventure park. Cutter then comes face to face with the sabre-toothed tiger responsible.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Logopolis
programme.desc: With the fate of the universe at stake, the Doctor and the Master must collaborate.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Castrovalva
programme.desc: The Doctor tries to recuperate within the Zero Room, leaving Nyssa, Adric, and Tegan to face the Master. Then Adric is taken, and the TARDIS plunges towards Event One.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Castrovalva
programme.desc: The Zero Room is gone, and the Doctor’s regeneration is unstable. To help him, Tegan locates the tranquil world of Castrovalva and the TARDIS heads there.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Castrovalva
programme.desc: Something is wrong with Castrovalva, but the Portreeve cannot help the Doctor identify the problem. And the Master is taunting Adric, caught in his web of power.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Castrovalva
programme.desc: As recursive occlusion threatens to destroy everything and everyone in Castrovalva, the Master’s space/time trap is revealed, with Adric at its heart.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Black Orchid
programme.desc: A murder is committed in Cranleigh Hall. The Cranleighs ask the Doctor to play cricket and then join them for a masked ball, enabling the killer to hide in plain sight.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Black Orchid
programme.desc: The Doctor stands accused, despite Lady Cranleigh knowing he is innocent. What is the secret she is protecting that allows her to let an honest man go to jail?

programme.title: Doctor Who: Earthshock
programme.desc: Silent but deadly androids are protecting a bomb buried beneath the Earth.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Earthshock
programme.desc: With her crew slowly vanishing, Briggs assumes the Doctor to be the guilty party.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Earthshock
programme.desc: The Cybermen are released from their silos and on the march.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Earthshock
programme.desc: The Doctor realises the freighter is now a huge bomb, with one passenger still aboard....

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Time-Flight
programme.desc: When a Concorde passenger jet seemingly vanishes on its final approach to Heathrow Airport, the Doctor is called in to investigate.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Time-Flight
programme.desc: Having been transported 140 million years back into the Jurassic period on Earth, the Doctor must try to work out why the mysterious Kalid has drawn them into this strange domain.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Time-Flight
programme.desc: Deep inside the citadel, the Doctor discovers the legendary Xeraphin who were believed to have been wiped out long ago. They have survived the radiation on Earth by merging themselves into one entity with incredible psychic powers.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Time-Flight
programme.desc: The Doctor must try and return the Concorde passengers back to their own time, but his TARDIS is missing vital components. Will he be able to stop the Master before it's too late? Meanwhile, Tegan is facing a difficult decision about her future.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Mawdryn Undead
programme.desc: Caught in a warp ellipse, the TARDIS is drawn to a huge spacecraft orbiting Earth whereupon the Doctor is separated in space and time from Nyssa and Tegan.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Mawdryn Undead
programme.desc: At Brendon School, the Doctor enlists the help of the Brigadier. At Brendon School, Tegan enlists the help of the Brigadier. Same man, different time periods, however.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Mawdryn Undead
programme.desc: Mawdryn and his eternal mutants are awake and reveal the truth, they are exiles, they are in pain and need something only the Doctor can give them. His future lives.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Mawdryn Undead
programme.desc: As the Doctor’s ethics are challenged and the two Brigadier's finally meet, Turlough plots with the Black Guardian to bring the Time Lord down once and for all.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Terminus
programme.desc: A sabotaged TARDIS has to make an emergency landing on a ship that is en route to the derelict space station Terminus. However, the station isn't as derelict as it appears, it's the last stop for the ship's cargo of lepers.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Terminus
programme.desc: Trapped amongst the victims of the highly contagious Lazar's disease, the Doctor and his companions must find a way back to the TARDIS. As Nyssa falls ill, who are the mysterious armoured figures closing in?

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Terminus
programme.desc: The Doctor and his companions have reached the Terminus. As they unravel its mysteries, they discover a terrible danger that could threaten the entire Universe!

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Terminus
programme.desc: As Terminus prepares to jettison its reactors, can the Doctor wrest the TARDIS free of the disease-ridden space station or is it truly the end of the Universe?

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Enlightenment
programme.desc: The TARDIS's power is drained away just as the Doctor receives a dire warning from the White Guardian, and before long finds himself drawn into a strange race throgh the stars...

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Enlightenment
programme.desc: While Tegan has to cope with the unwelcome attention of Marriner, the Doctor realises that Striker and his officers are Eternals and that the human crew mean nothing to them...

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Enlightenment

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Yorkshire terrier who became aggressive after going blind; a spoiled Pekingese/miniature poodle mix; a Rottweiler with a dangerous obsession with the horses on the ranch where she lives.

programme.desc: A Yorkshire terrier barks too much; a once-shy German shepherd becomes aggressive; a shepherd mix has a whining problem.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar revisits some of his toughest cases and sees how being on the show changed not only the dogs, but the lives of the owners.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A German shepherd and Welsh corgi mix has dog aggression; a blind Lab chases his tail when he is around food.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog goes after a fugitive named Tracy who lives in a homeless shelter, but the shelter's staff is uncooperative, and the two sides get into an angry confrontation that forces Dog to temporarily back off.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog juggles his job and family responsibilities at the same time. He leads the search for Robert, a low-level drug dealer. As he hunts down Robert, Dog gets on the phone to tell Beth not to spend too much money to furnish Leland's Honolulu apartment.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Upset because one his puppies may die and wanting to give the little guy a second chance in life, Dog decides to offer one of the fugitives a second chance, too. He captures Paul, a meth addict, then steers him to a rehab program instead of jail.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and his team are out to revoke bail on Eugene, a chronic heroin addict. They find him in a squalid apartment with a huge stockpile of syringes, and they can see that his physical condition is deteriorating.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and his team fight the war on ice-crystal methamphetamine-on many fronts. They appear on a special anti-drug float in a parade. Then they go after bail-jumping Pana, a convicted drug dealer.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Hunting down a fugitive known as "Bozo," Dog gets help from an unexpected source, Bozo's father-in-law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and the team get a big surprise after they track down Bosco, a fugitive who they believe is addicted to methamphetamines. They discover he's off drugs, settling into a normal life with a new girlfriend, and is very friendly.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Leland has a full plate of fugitives in Kona, and the whole family heads to the Big Island to help.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog visits his mother's grave for inspiration before heading out to find Frankie, a violent fugitive hiding in the jungle. The spirit of Ma Chapman seems to help when Dog finds an unusual ally; Frankie's mother.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog lectures high school students about the dangers of drugs before going after Joseph, a dangerous fugitive who won't be easy to capture.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog takes the day off to try his hand at coaching, and assigns Tim and Leland to track down a dangerous fugitive on their own. Can the boys prove they can handle it?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: The boys get distracted by the bikini-clad lovelies on Waikiki when they hunt for Lucy, a homeless, alcoholic fugitive. Beth is amused by the boys, but this is serious business: Tim will have to pay the bond if Lucy isn't caught.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog faces a tough personal and professional situation when he must hunt down his friend, Ili, who has helped him on many busts. But now Ili's on the other side of the law, and now Dog must bring her in.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is out to make two grabs on two islands in one day. Part of the team is goes to Kona to nab a woman who skipped her court date. Meanwhile, Dog and the others hunt Patrick, a fugitive who's fighting in an Extreme Boxing event on the Big Island.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog has only a few days to catch a woman nicknamed Cats or forfeit Beth's $10,000 bond. But it won't be easy - Cats is eight months pregnant, so Dog will have to lure her in rather than risk a violent grab.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is in for a big surprise after he catches a fugitive named Jonaven in a sting operation.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and the team really have their hands full when they go after a tough guy named Nunu, who leads them on a chase through apartment complexes and a shopping mall before he's finally captured.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog's feeling lucky, so he's going to try to capture two women in one day. The first, Moani, has "crazy" tattooed on her neck and is facing drug charges. The second fugitive, Jade, who turns out to be a tough catch, despite help from Jade's sister.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog has problems when he goes to a small town on the Big Island of Hawaii to track down a fugitive. In a small town, everyone knows everyone else's business, making it impossible for Dog to hunt in secret.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and the team search for Jonah, a violent and desperate criminal facing?20 years in jail. The trail goes stale when Dog runs into evasive family members and an angry girlfriend.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and the team go after Kandice, AKA Candy, AKA Suga, a stripper who didn't make her court appearance. They convince one of her friends to lure her to a supermarket parking lot, where Dog has an easy time fetching the fetching young thing. But then

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and Beth take on the heartbreaking case of Rachel. Rachel's mom bailed her out of jail on condition that she go to AA meetings and stick to a curfew. But Rachel hasn't kept up her end of the bargain, and now her mother wants her back to jail.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is trying to cut down on smoking, but it's not easy with his high-stress job. Today, he must track down Walter, a fugitive who believes that the Canadian military has planted a chip in his teeth that allows him to communicate with his van.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Beth designs a luxurious new office for the team and shows it off to Dog, but the bounty hunter is more interested in starting his hunt for Federico, who's been revoked for missing court dates and generally running amuck.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog goes on his a case, which involves Bobby, who's been on parole for three months pending sentencing on an assault charge. Bobby's girlfriend wants him back in jail, and Dog agrees that the Bobby needs to be behind bars.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog pursues two people whose lives have been ruined by drugs. First, he tracks Mae, who traded a good home and loving family for an ice pipe. The next case involves Jude. His addiction has caused his pregnant wife to fear for her safety.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is a rough, tough bounty hunter, but he's a softie at heart, as the two cases in this episode show.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Blake offers to help Amanda find her father. Claudia goes out with Dean to dinner, while Steven rejects Luke. Jeff ends up sleeping with Nicole. Dominique goes to Istanbul to meet with Rashid Ahmed.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Krystle goes into premature labor and delivers a baby girl, who suffers from respiratory problems. She names the child Kristina after a friend who once saved her life. Claudia is uneasy when Steven accompanies Luke on a business trip.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Upon learning that he may be Amanda's father, Blake resolves to ask Amanda to take a blood test. Nicole tells Jeff there's a chance Peter DeVilbis may have been with another woman at the time of the crash.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Blake buys back his racehorse Allegre from owner Daniel Reece, who sends Krystle a gift. Furious, she demands to know how he dared approach her after what happened with her sister, Iris. Amanda learns she is Blake's daughter.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Krystle reconciles with Daniel, who reveals that his break-up with her sister was amicable. Claudia moves into La Mirage. Krystle confides to Steven that Daniel is Sammy Jo's father and therefore little Danny's grandfather.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Claudia rebuffs Steven's conciliatory attempts. Tension between Dex and Amanda continues to mount. On his deathbed, Tom Carrington makes amends with Blake, and in a final dramatic gesture, has his will changed.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Krystle begins working with Daniel. Blake is adamantly opposed and exchanges harsh words with Reece. Dex is furious with Alexis for traveling to Sumatra to see Blake's father. Alexis learns from Amanda about Dex's experience with Daniel in Vietnam.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Krystle launches her new business with the purchase of an Arabian horse. Sexual tension between Steven and Luke mounts. Jeff and Nikki return from Bolivia with the news of their marriage and they move into the mansion.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Blake returns triumphant from his negotiations with the Chinese. Alexis vows to buy into the venture. Krystle, uncomfortable with Daniel's increasing attention, avoids him. Blake invites Amanda to accompany him on a business trip to Acapulco.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Alexis attempts to persuade the head of the Chinese delegation to hire Colbyco. Blake is surprised to learn Lady Ashley is an Acapulco. Amanda has a romantic fling with Prince Michael of Moldavia. Krystle makes a surprise visit to Daniel.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Amanda spends the night with Prince Michael and then is heartsick to learn he is engaged. Dex persuades the Chinese delegation to use his company instead of Blake's for an important drilling job. Claudia finally accepts Adam's advances.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Tensions between Krystle and Blake mount as their suspicions of one another grow. Claudia regrets sleeping with Adam. Dominique derails Alexis' attempt to buy out her company but is unable to stop Brady's divorce proceedings.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Dominique remains in critical condition after collapsing. Luke pays an unexpected visit to Steven. Blake tells his son that he will support him regardless of his sexual persuasion. Alexis calls her former lover, King Galen, a Middle Eastern monarch.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Alexis attempts to persuade King Galen to allow a marriage between Amanda and his son. She sweetens the offer by suggesting his country would receive a portion of Colbyco's revenues. Dominique advises Krystle to reconcile with Blake.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Una típica familia mexicana disfuncional conformada por Gaspar, el padre de la familia, su hijo Jonathan, el abuelo, y un amigo cercano a la familia al que apodan "El Noruego", harán de las suyas en esta comedia animada.

programme.title: Norteados con Don Cheto
programme.desc: EstrellaTV es el canal líder en español de noticias y entretenimiento con una gran variedad de programación que abarca noticias y juegos, realities, competencias de talento y “talk shows”. ¡Una experiencia que no se pueden perder!

programme.title: 100 latinos dijeron
programme.desc: Dos familias competirán respondiendo a distintas preguntas por la oportunidad de ganar dinero basados en las respuestas más populares, de acuerdo a las previamente respondidas por 100 latinos alrededor de Estados Unidos.

programme.title: Retofamosos
programme.desc: Seis famosos son reunidos en una azotea para enfrentar los retos más atrevidos, graciosos, chuscos y hasta arriesgados en donde el glamour y la fama se quedan atrás para dar paso a la diversión y el buen humor.

programme.title: A que no puedes
programme.desc: Emocionante juego que enfrenta a dos equipos de celebridades en su intento por realizar pruebas y retos únicos. El equipo que complete con éxito la tarea, ganará dinero para una obra de ayuda social.

programme.title: 100 latinos dijeron

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When two women went missing and were later found brutally murdered, police wondered if they were victims of a hate crime.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The murder of an eccentric millionaire was not entirely unexpected; he flaunted his wealth and cared little for personal security. The evidence at the crime seemed to indicate robbery, but investigators wondered if there was something more.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Firefighters find an entire family dead inside their home in an apparent murder-suicide, but there are several inconsistent clues in the rubble. Could ballistics, a time card and some secret audiotapes unravel the mystery?

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1994, Rhoda Nathan was found murdered in a Cincinnati hotel room. When hotel employee Elwood Jones visited the emergency room with an infected hand, which he said was cut on a dumpster, the doctor recognized the injury as something else.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In the search for the killer of two Texas teenagers, a behavioral profile led to suspect Jason Massey. Hard science proved the profile was correct, and Massey was executed by lethal injection on April 3, 2001.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2000, Christina Sanoubane was murdered in her Cedar Rapids apartment after moving away from her abusive boyfriend. There are clues at the scene: bloody footprints and DNA from the victim's rape kit.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When police discovered the body of Douglas Beamish's estranged wife, authorities linked 20 cat hairs found on her jacket to a cat owned by Beamish's parents. It was the first time animal DNA was used to solve a criminal case.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: It was one of the most unusual cases in forensic history. Investigators had to find a way to solve a murder case using only a squashed tomato found at the crime scene and tiny, pinpoint reflections of light in a photograph.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When two boys are brutally attacked, investigators rely on evidence fished out of a nearby pond. It became the first case where diatom analysis was used to place a suspect at the scene of the crime.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1994, 19-year-old Shannon Melendi disappeared while at Emory University. Her disappearance remained a mystery for ten years, until new scientific testing cast a different light on Colvin "Butch" Hinton.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police investigate a discarded sleeping bag containing bloody sneakers and a purse, which eventually leads to the body of a young woman. A mark found on the victim's body enables police to track the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A young woman is stabbed more than 100 times. The killer leaves DNA behind, but investigators must play a cat-and-mouse game to obtain a suspect's DNA to match.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A suspect's former lover comes forward with a fantastic tale of murder, mutilation and cremation. But there's no way to test the story's validity — until a plant pathologist and a dendrochronologist conduct tests where the cremation supposedly occurred.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Rachael Mullenix, 19, was convicted of stabbing her mother, Barbara Mullenix, in 2006. She allegedly packed her mother's bloodied corpse in a cardboard box before dumping it in California's Newport Bay.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In the early hours of a morning just before Christmas, a college student was abducted from the parking lot of her apartment. Her body was found later that day; she had been sexually assaulted and shot at point-blank range.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a woman disappeared without a trace, there were two possible explanations: kidnapping or murder. Careful investigation, a forensic artist and DNA profiling enabled police to find a single suspect, who was known to prey upon vulnerable women.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1984, a passerby finds the torso of a woman in a cardboard box. A forensic entomologist analyzes nearby insect activity to determine when the victim was killed.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The only clue recovered from a shooting is a twelve-guage shotgun. Scientists use unique methods to lift the serial number from the weapon to trace it to its owner

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A 13-year-old girl went missing from her Colorado home. The only evidence the kidnapper left behind was three fingerprints on a window screen.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When heart surgeon Darryl Sutorius is found dead in the basement of his upscale Cincinnati home, police assume he committed suicide. Further investigation reveals that his new wife Della has a history of violence and an insatiable desire for money.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2002, a small community in upstate New York was devastated when Patty Wlasiuk died in a truck accident. But burdock seed pods found in her hair and on her clothes indicated that this was no accident — it was cold-blooded murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a 9-year-old girl goes missing, police and volunteers spend weeks searching for her. A psychic's vision leads to a field where her body is discovered, along with what investigators hope is enough evidence to find her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2005, the body of young mother Summer Baldwin was found in a suitcase in a Texas landfill.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Tracey Frame, 35, was convicted of killing David Nixon in April 2002 after he planned to end their relationship.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: While vacationing in California, Earl Morris learns that his wife has gone missing from their Arizona home. The search for Ruby Morris involves dozens of investigators and scientists — and even the Coast Guard.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman is shot to death in her store just one day before she is to testify against the man accused of robbing her. The robber becomes the prime suspect, but he has a solid alibi: a timestamped videotape of his activities on the day of the murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: When our heroes are invited back to Darkly’s Boarding School, they discover it’s a trap set up by Lord Garmadon and his evil replica ninjas created by Garmadon’s new Mega-Weapon.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: The ninja face off with an exhibit of a Stone Samurai Warrior that the toxic venom from the Great Devourer has brought to life while Garmadon manages to find a fabled Dark Island that is said to hold dark powers.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: La familia va a Washington a pedir la mano de Ivanka con un resultado inesperado, mientras que Johnny busca deshacer la relación enfermiza entre el Abuelo y Peluzín.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego recibe la sorpresa que después de una muchos años de crímenes su papá le deja un jugoso botín como herencia, mientras que Jonathan y Ortega buscan a un adulto que los lleve a la premier de la película del momento.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego se muda a un lujoso departamento y se dedica a buscar a un nuevo roommate, mientras que El Abuelo y Jonathan se pelean por quedarse con el cuarto una vez que el Noruego dejo el departamento.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Jonathan es admitido a una reconocida escuela privada y Gaspar al no poder cubrir los gastos decide aventurarse con Peluzín en unos negocios turbios, mientras el Noruego busca consejos por parte de su familia porque no esta contento.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El abuelo se ahoga con un hueso de pollo y LFDB se ve forzada a buscar ayuda de emergencia, mientras que el Noruego y Peluzín deciden ingresar a un gimnasio y competir por los resultados.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo se involucra sentimentalmente con la nueva roommate del Noruego, la cual esconde un oscuro secreto, mientras tanto Peluzín y Jony buscan lanzar a Olaf al estrellato.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Tenta-Culo celebra su aniversario y hace una gran fiesta donde invita a todos, desafortunadamente durante el evento sucede un crimen y nadie puede salir hasta encontrar al responsable.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Gaspar y el Abuelo se topan con una familia muy peculiar, situación que el Abuelo busca aprovechar, mientras que Peluzín y Pitipu buscan curar a Don Sebas de una extraña adicción.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Pelúzín se roba un paquete de la puerta de Don Sebas, volteando a todo el edificio de cabeza, mientras Jonathan, cansado del bullying del Abuelo decide darle una lección.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Gaspar encuentra por fin el amor de manera inesperada mientras que el Pasita, triste por las limitaciones de su edad avanzada consigue la receta para la eterna juventud.

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego descubre por accidente que cuenta con poderes mentales y decide aprovecharlos para su conveniencia, mientras que el Diablo sube del inframundo para buscar un nuevo asistente en Peluzín.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo necesita un trasplante de riñón y ninguno de los Del Barrio es compatible para donarle uno. Sin embargo, Peluzín tiene la solución en sus manos.

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: En este episodio La familia del barrio muestra una divertida parodia a las Sitcoms mas populares, desde la óptica del prototipo de familia mexicana disfuncional.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Un incidente hace que Irma revalore su vida y desaparezca. Mientras el Abuelo y el Noruego tratan de encontrarla, Gaspar y Jonathan tratan de encontrarle su lugar a Olaf en la familia.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego todavía no puede asimilar que perdió toda su fortuna, mientras que el Abuelo malaconseja a Peluzín de cómo pagar la renta atrasada de su departamento.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego cansado de que todo mundo lo busque solo por su dinero busca a Pitipú para que le ayude a idear un plan, mientras que Peluzín se embarca en el mundo de la robótica.

programme.desc: En una borrachera, el Abuelo y el Noruego atropellan con su coche a Santa Claus justo antes de la Navidad. Para no dejar a los niños sin regalos, el Abuelo toma el lugar del accidentado.

programme.title: Great Games
programme.desc: 8/11/2021 - Tom Seaver's 10 strikeouts set the MLB consecutive strikeout record and it took 51 years for not one but TWO MLB pitchers to match history.

programme.title: Great Games

programme.title: Great Games

programme.title: Súper Shore

programme.title: Súper Shore

programme.title: Una casa de locos

programme.title: Una casa de locos

programme.title: Una casa de locos

programme.title: Una casa de locos

programme.title: Una casa de locos

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Fritz will do anything to help his cousin out - even sleep with his fiancee! Bradley's mom and wife confront him over his affair with his mom's doppelganger!

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show: Who’s Hurting My Granddaughter?
programme.desc: Maria claims that her son’s ex Amy and her new boyfriend Brian are abusing and neglecting her granddaughter. But Amy says Maria is a racist and angry over raising her grandchild in a Hispanic home!

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show: I’m Not the Man You Think I Am
programme.desc: Sean says his wife has made him so angry that he’s put her in the hospital over 10 times. Sean’s also got a secret of his own—he is really a she! Can Steve help Sean iron out his issues?

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Sabrionna has been waiting to return for a DNA and lie detector test to prove that Anthony's the father and she has been faithful to him! Then, Patrick returns to prove that he's not the father of Angel's baby while her man Dale fumes!

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Russell wants to put his family back together after his 3 children died in a fire. Next, Tatiana believes her 2-year old nephew was abused. And she's accusing her sister's ex-fiance Chris. Chris says he's not an abuser.

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show: She's a Crazy Stalker
programme.desc: Victor met Jasmine a few years ago, but claimed they never had sex. Jasmine claims that they fell in love and wants him back! Who's telling the truth?

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show: Teen Mom Murderer?
programme.desc: At 17, Janelle's infant son died from serious injuries. She was sentenced to 3 years in prison for reckless homicide, but claims she's innocent. What will her polygraph results say?

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show: I Have Two Husbands
programme.desc: Jessica married Gian after a five month relationship. With a baby on the way, everything seems to be going great for the couple, except Jessica is married to another man, Michael!

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show: Is My Husband the Abuser?
programme.desc: Did Marlo touch his daughter with Sandra when she was 7? He’s been avoiding confrontation with her for almost 10 years, but today, Sandra won’t leave without the truth nor justice for their child!

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: Da'Shan is here with his new girl Tyrekia to prove that he's not the father of Ashley's baby! Ashley is 1000% positive that Da'Shan is the father and is here to prove it once and for all. But what will the DNA results reveal?

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: Waldo refuses to believe that he fathered Chelsea’s baby because of her pale complexion. Then, Kianna found pics of naked women in Nick’s phone and condoms and cologne in his gym bag. What will Maury’s lie detector results say?

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: On Today's MAURY… The time for lying is over and the truth will be revealed. Who's right and who's about to get caught red handed! It's wild tales of cheating lovers forced to face the lie detector results on today's MAURY!

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Edwin returns to the show after finding his current girlfriend Jenny in the closet with another man and wants a lie detector test! Then, Steve sorts through a messy love triangle of a bi-sexual and polyamorous couple, Spencer and Alisha!

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Nye and her boyfriend spent last Easter with her family, but he spent most of it drinking and ignoring her until he left without a trace. Where was he that night? Plus, Jackie admitted to cheating on her boyfriend, but he believes there was more!

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show: Steve, I Think He's Gay
programme.desc: Sharina thinks that Clarence is cheating on her because he’s always out late. Plus, Chrystal doesn’t want Earnie’s ex Tenyia to live with them just because she’s the mother of his child.

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: ¿Probará Katrina, de 25 años, que Christopher, de 50 años, es el padre de su bebé y callará a su nueva novia, Suprina? ¿El padre del bebé de Sarah es Johnny o un hombre casado? Además, Robert niega ser padre de los bebés de dos mujeres.

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: ¡Brittany cree que Dionte es el padre de su bebé y lo demostrará! Después, Melissa, de 24 años, afirma que Rob, de 47 años, es el padre de su bebé, ¡pero la hija de Rob quiere pruebas!

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Tammy sospecha que su marido Johnnie se acuesta con Renee y que Robert escucha a su hermana y le es infiel a su prometida adolescente Raven. Además, ¿Tom se acostó con la esposa de su mejor amigo?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: ¿El prometido de Tiffany, Deon, dejó embarazada a su mejor amiga lesbiana? Después, William cree que sus 2 de sus 6 hijos con su ex-esposa Nicole no son suyos y puede ser el padre del hijo de otra mujer! ¡Nuestras pruebas de ADN nos revelan la verdad!

programme.title: El show de Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: La familia de Jackie no confía en su novio cuando está con sus hijos, pero ella insiste en seguir con él. ¿Qué horrible verdad revelará la prueba del detector de mentiras de Shaqualla sobre su novio?

programme.title: El show de Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Katrina cree que el novio de su hermana Kendra es un infiel y que tiene sexo con su mejor amiga, Nay-Nay. Después, John vuelve al escenario con algo sorprendente.

programme.title: El show de Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Teneal y Richard cuentan historias diferentes, cada uno alegando que el otro no es apto para ser padre. La verdad se limitará a una prueba con el detector de mentiras, y los resultados serán impactantes.

programme.title: El show de Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Hoy Danny por fin está listo para enfrentarse al hombre ausente de su vida y responder a las preguntas de su vida. Steven da varias excusas para no ver a su hijo, pero ¿es posible redimirse?

programme.title: El show de Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Cuando la gente normal necesita ayuda, Steve Wilkos está listo para responder a la llamada. Mira cómo Steve ayuda a la gente normal a defenderse y a luchar por sus creencias para promover la justicia para todos.

programme.title: El show de Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Tres años más tarde, Elizabeth todavía tiene muchas dudas sobre las intenciones de Manny con su familia y su marido Rodney está en medio. ¿Manny es inocente?

programme.title: El show de Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Sharina thinks that Clarence is cheating on her because he's always out late. Plus, Chrystal doesn't want Earnie's ex Tenyia to live with them just because she's the mother of his child.

programme.title: El show de Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Joyia está desesperada por evitar que su amiga Stephanie vuelva con su problemático ex Scott. ¡Pero ella todavía lo ama! ¿Tendrá la voluntad de dejarlo?

programme.title: El show de Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Jack está preocupado por sus nietos porque su nuera Carol ha sido negligente y tiene mal genio. Después, Kendra explica por qué de repente dio el bebé de Corey en adopción.

programme.title: El show de Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: La adolescente Megan vive con su antiguo novio controlador Rick. Megan no puede ir a la escuela, buscar trabajo, ni comer sin su permiso. ¿Pueden su tía y Steve lograr hacerla entender?

programme.title: El show de Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Dennis afirma que su ex-novia Kendal lo mantiene amarrado con mentiras sobre su embarazo. ¡Quiere saber si es el padre de su hija! ¿Finalmente los resultados de la prueba de ADN de Steve les permitirán seguir adelante?

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Patricio amenaza a Silvano con una pistola. Rodrigo llega a casa de Karina. Ella le dice que quiere curarse para mejorar y para quererlo. Luis Mario le cuelga el teléfono a Griselda.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Camelia aconseja a Patricio que encierre a Rosaura en un manicomio. Luis Mario y Maribella se besan y Luis Mario la llama Rosaura. Jimena le dice a Guillermo que prepare todo para el matrimonio.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Teobaldito y Mairita hablan de sus familias cuando llega Rosaura con regalos para la niña, que supone es hermana del niño. Después llega Luis Mario, que viene a traerle merienda a los chicos.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Rosaura le cuenta a su abuela que está intentando recordar que fue lo que hizo con su hija y cuál fue el parque donde estuvo. Guillermo le propone a Jimena que no se casen.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Camelia y Griselda comienzan a llevar a cabo el plan que tienen para volver loca a Rosaura, mientras que Rosaura discute con su abuela por haberle permitido a Luis Mario entrar en su habitación.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Silvano visita a Rosaura en su casa y le exige que se aleje de Patricio para siempre y que juntos traten de ser felices. Rosaura se niega a seguirlo y junto a Claudia le insisten que se marche.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Patricio teme que Rosaura descubra la verdad acerca de Angeliquita, pero Carlos y Sonia tratan de tranquilizarlo. Camelia y Griselda entre tanto se sienten tranquilas.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Luis Mario y Caridad tienen la esperanza que Angeliquita haga un poco feliz a Rosaura, que aún no ha podido recuperar a su hijita, pero Silvano llega para desafiar a Luis Mario.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Panchita riñe a Verdoso por haberle gritado a Eduardo que asesinó a Anselmo y trata de hacerlo callar pero el loro la acusa de haber sido ella quien se lo contó. Caridad se entera de todo.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Mairita corre a buscar a su hermana para contarle que Teobaldito está muy asustado porque su madre está en la casa y él teme que se lo quiera llevar.

programme.title: Amor comprado
programme.desc: Martín se niega a devolver a Mariana al rancho de Saladino, como él lo exige y tienen una fuerte pelea. Todos los familiares de Luciano se reúnen para saber quién administrará la fortuna en su ausencia.

programme.title: Amor comprado

programme.title: Amor comprado
programme.desc: Enrique lleva a Luciano al hospital creyendo que su estado es grave. Luciano solo lo está probando para ver si realmente es bueno y merece otra oportunidad. Le piden una declaración acerca de Luciano.

programme.title: Amor comprado
