programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy struggles to stay a step ahead of a prison patrol made up of hungry lions and poisonous scorpions! Meanwhile, Ace spends what could be his final hours swapping stories with a pirate who hates pirates.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: While the guards struggle to squelch a violent prison uprising, Luffy and his fellow fugitives try to keep their cool in a level of Impel Down known as Starvation Hell!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Boa Hancock uses her ample assets to buy some private time for a clandestine chat with Ace. Meanwhile, Luffy needs help from a graceful friend to escape the jaws of a hungry Sphinx!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and Bon are on the verge of reaching Level 4, but they didn't count on fighting a demonic, lightning-fast, devastatingly powerful Minotaur! To defeat this beast, they'll need help from a human candle and a deranged clown!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy narrowly avoids a deadly dip in the boiling pool of blood, only to find himself face to face with Warden Magellan. Meanwhile, outside the prison walls, the marine fleet prepares for Whitebeard's onslaught!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Warden Magellan is a monster of a man with a penchant for poisoning prisoners. To rescue Ace, Luffy must go toe to toe with this toxic terror, but how do you defeat a foe who's deadly to the touch?

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy's daring assault on the venomous warden of Impel Down leaves him struggling to stand up, but despite the lethal poison breaking down his body, the rubber-man kicks his rescue mission into Second Gear!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: While Luffy hovers perilously on the verge of death, Bon Clay embarks on a suicidal rescue mission plagued by sub-zero temperatures and bloodthirsty wolves with a supremely savage disposition!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: No existing antidote can save Luffy from the poison coursing through his veins, yet Bon Clay refuses to give up. His final, fleeting hope is a mysterious miracle-worker rumored to have vanished into the Gates of Hell!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Bon is overjoyed to hear that Luffy is still alive, but his happiness quickly turns to shock when he learns that Ivan's agonizingly painful "Healing Hormones" will cost the rubber-man ten years of his life!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Ace is scheduled to be executed in a matter of hours, and Luffy's still hovering on the verge of death. It will take a miracle to save them both, but Bon would rather die than give up on his friend!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy miraculously survived his brush with death, but he's far too weak to finish rescuing Ace. Ivan is reluctant to lend a hormonal hand to the doomed rescue mission – until he learns of Luffy's lineage!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The quest to rescue Ace tuckers out thanks to a blast of sleeping gas! Ivan's scissor-handed sidekick puts an end to nap time, but Luffy will have to join forces with a scar-faced foe from the past if he wants to complete his mission!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy's desperate attempt to rescue Ace is bolstered by two powerful new allies: the murderous Crocodile and the honorable fishman Jinbei. Meanwhile, Ivan sparks a prison riot to create a diversion for the rubber-man.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and his gang of outlaws cause a commotion on Level Four, Blackbeard's arrival leads to the release of the prison's most feared inmate, and Ace gazes upon the great blue sky for what could be the very last time!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Ivan undergoes a curvaceous transformation to better battle sadistic Sadie, the commander of the Demon Guards. Meanwhile, Blackbeard and Shiryu head for a showdown on Level 1!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy's bone-crushing battle with the Vice Warden of Impel Down is interrupted by the sudden appearance of Blackbeard. When the rubber-man hears what the warlord has to say – heads will roll!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Even in Second Gear, Luffy is no match for Blackbeard's vortex, but the rubber-man rebounds by knocking out a Demon Guard with one ferocious pistol-punch. Elsewhere, Warden Magellan vows to finish Luffy once and for all!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Ace is to be executed in a matter of hours, and Magellan's toxic breath is singeing the back of Luffy's neck. Ivan uses a devastating Death Wink to buy some time, but the warden's Poison Hydra may be more than he can handle!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy dons a suit of waxy armor in preparation for his rematch with Warden Magellan. Outside the prison walls, Jimbei turns a door into a boat, so Crocodile and Buggy can commandeer an escape vessel!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Magellan takes his toxic attack to the next level by unleashing the hideous and deadly Venom Demon! If Jimbei and Crocodile don't return with a rescue ship soon, Luffy won't survive long enough to save Ace!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and his merry band of escapees are safely onboard the rescue ship, but they're not out of hot water just yet. A fleet of marines is bombarding them with cannon balls, and an impenetrable gate looms on the horizon!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and Ivan mourn the loss of Bon Clay, and Captain Buggy's reputation gets a boost when a phone call from the Marines reveals the secrets of his past.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: While Luffy continues his rescue mission, Nami learns a lesson about how to turn rain into cash, and Franky wakes up in a freezing forest full of ferocious cyborg animals!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Sanji tries to fight his way off a most peculiar island, but his frilly battle costume threatens to awaken his inner maiden. Elsewhere, Chopper tries to avoid being served in a hot pot!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nico Robin lends her many hands to an overmatched gang of revolutionaries in a frigid land of eternal suffering, and Usopp bulks up to avoid becoming a snack for a hungry, hungry island!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Zoro's attempt to reunite with his friends leads him to a massive tomb and a host of shadowy swordsmen. Elsewhere, Brook uses his status as Satan to get an eyeful of undergarments!

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis

programme.desc: Dr. Drew asks Briana about the treatment she's received from the other moms, Kailyn and her exes talk about co-parenting, and Leah and Jeremy respond to rumors about their relationship.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant
programme.desc: Brianna considers moving to a new place, Jade has concerns about her parents, Ashley prepares for her baby shower, and Lexi fights rumors about her pregnancy.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant
programme.desc: Tensions boil over at Ashley's baby shower, Lexi has an ultrasound, Jade's father loses his job after a failed drug test, and Brianna's mother has a talk with her and Danae.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant
programme.desc: Lexi prepares for homecoming, Jade goes to the doctor alone, Kayla sets boundaries in her relationship, and Brianna starts to address her financial troubles.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant
programme.desc: Jade hits a major milestone in her pregnancy, Lexi figures out where she stands with Kyler, Ashley has reservations about Shen, and Brianna takes a trip to Chicago.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant
programme.desc: Jade struggles to care for Kloie by herself, Ashley and Bar take their last trip with friends before becoming parents, and Brianna and Danae get ready for their child's birth.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant
programme.desc: Tempers flare between Brianna and Danae, Kayla questions her future with Stephan, Lexi and Ashley give birth, and Jade spends time away from Sean after a heated argument.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant
programme.desc: Kayla and Stephan welcome Baby Izaiah, Sean pops the question to Jade amid rising tensions with her parents, and Brianna must choose between living with Danae or her mom.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant
programme.desc: Brianna and Danae struggle to find an apartment without credit, Ashley bails Bar out of jail, and Kayla must care for her son without her mom's help for the first time.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant
programme.desc: Kyler plays hard to get with Lexi, Danae makes a big announcement, Sean disappoints Jade, and Kayla celebrates her birthday.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant
programme.desc: Brianna and Danae break up, Kyler learns some tough lessons about love, Jade and Sean continue to fight, and Ashley tries to get Bar to make up with her parents.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Juan siente envidia de Óscar y Jimena y presiona a Norma para que también se mude a la hacienda. En un arrebato de celos, Concha llega a la fiesta y le dispara a Leonidas al verlo con Melisa.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Norma asiste a la exposición de caballos, Carmela hostiga a la empleada que cuida al bebé y se queda con él con malas intenciones, Norma se devuelve a tiempo y la saca a empujones del cuarto.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Las Elizondo se preocupan por los pésimos resultados obtenidos en la feria de caballos y descubren que Fernando vendió los mejores ejemplares de la hacienda, Gabriela lo encara y él la enreda.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Sara ve a Malcolm cuando espía a Norma en la tina y las dos lo acorralan para caerle a golpes. Quintina y Dominga se van a las manos por Olegario, Ruth se entera de quién es su verdadera mamá.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Norma revisa los informes de la hacienda y comprueba sus sospechas, Eva detiene a Ruth cuando se marcha de la casa y le aclara por qué la abandonó, Quintina y Dominga se vengan de Olegario.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Juan llega con la policía a reclamarle a Fernando la golpiza a Olegario, ambos son llevados a la comisaría. Por las noches la hacienda Elizondo se convierte en un casino de apuestas y negocios.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Norma atrapa a Fernando con una mujer en la cama, él envuelve a Gabriela en otra mentira y pelea con Norma en el balcón desde donde cae por accidente. Concha salva a los Reyes de una emboscada.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Fernando aprovecha su quebranto para manipular a Gabriela y amenaza de muerte a Norma. Franco cree que ella y Sara corren peligro y les recomienda que salgan de la hacienda cuanto antes.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Constanza le cuenta a Rodrigo todo el calvario vivido en el manicomio; también le habla de su relación con Gabriela y Lucho. David se muda a casa de Francisca y Antonia enfurece. Los guardaespaldas de Verónica salvan a Gastón de un atentado.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Constanza arremete contra Aníbal y jura llevarlo ante la justicia. El senador Villegas pide perdón y se queja de su salud. Antonia y Verónica saben que la guerra está declarada. Rodrigo duda de la identidad de Dantés. David y Cecilia se reconcilian.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Constanza enfrenta a Antonia delante de todos. La acusa de beneficiarse de su encierro y del de Gabriela para apoderarse del Chamuco. Guerra encuentra una nueva aliada. Aníbal se recupera de su infarto y ya no es senador. La salud de Lucía empeora.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Irene le pide perdón a Verónica y horas más tarde recibe una carta de Gabriela donde dice: “Te perdono”. Constanza quiere demostrar que Antonia es cómplice de Aníbal Villegas. El senador tiene las cuentas congeladas. Guerra prepara una coartada.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: La venganza contra los Elizondo está en peligro, Juan se enfrenta con sus propios sentimientos. Sara y Jimena son invitadas al bar, mientras Rosario recibe una noticia al terminar su show.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Juan entra sin permiso en la habitación de Norma y la besa, él queda asombrado por su reacción. Gabriela acuerda el noviazgo de sus hijas menores con los sobrinos de su amiga Raquel.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family would like to vacation on the moon, but the billion-dollar travel cost is slightly prohibitive. Uncle Fester volunteers $21.13 and Morticia, using Gomez's new supercomputer, suggests placing a $2,000 bet on the daily double horse race.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Cousin Itt is advocated as curator of the local zoo. Gomez uses his influence with Park Commissioner Fisk (guest star Alan Reed) to promote Itt for the job, but the zookeepers are convinced the Addamses' cousin should be confined to a cage.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandmama (Blossom Rock) is hauled off to jail for setting up a fortune-telling booth in the Addamses' living room. Gomez (John Astin) volunteers to act as attorney, and the court session becomes a shambles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez (John Astin) loses his memory after hitting his head; he fails to recognize Morticia (Carolyn Jones) and says the house looks like a condemned museum. The Addamses take turns hitting Gomez on the head trying to help him regain his memory.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Thing disappears from his box. Failing to find a single trace of Thing, Gomez (John Astin) conducts an investigation--with all members of the household under suspicion. Also starring Carolyn Jones, Jackie Coogan, and Ted Cassidy.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester applies for a job as an insurance salesman with the same company which is threatening to cancel the Addamses' policy (because Fester keeps blowing things up). Fester convinces the company interviewer that he is qualified for the job.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch becomes inconsolable when Gomez donates the family antique harpsichord to a collector. Gomez and Morticia offer Lurch a balalaika and a set of drums. When this proves unsatisfactory, Gomez and Fester decide to build a new harpsichord.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Morticia hears the stock market has crashed, she assumes that Gomez has been financially wiped out and rallies the family to help make money. Morticia gives lessons, Lurch and Fester run an escort service, and the kids run a poison drink stand.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: While enjoying a moonlight picnic and snail hunt, the Addams Family is mistaken for Martians by uniformed investigators from Mysterious Space Objects Headquarters. In turn, Gomez (John Astin) and the clan regard their inquisitors with suspicion.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: An organ grinder's fugitive monkey leads Fester to believe that he has turned Pugsley into a monkey. Morticia and Gomez treat the monkey as though he were their son, welcoming him to the dinner table and giving him Pugsley's chores.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's favorite charity is having an auction--so Morticia persuades her family to part with things to sell. Donations include Wednesday's headless doll, the old flogging table, a stuffed vulture and Uncle Fester's dynamite.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The Addams Family ignores notices that their house is to be condemned to make way for a freeway. When sudden explosions cannot be traced to any member of the family but, instead, to city workmen, Gomez is forced to consider moving the house.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester's pen pal, Madelyn, is coming to visit. Fester panics, as he has described himself as handsome, heroic and romantic. Gomez and Morticia agree that all Fester needs is a toupee and they help him make several styles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez are worried about Cousin Itt because he spends his days sleeping and dreaming in his tiny room. They decide that Itt would make an excellent marriage counselor, and pretend to be a couple with a failing marriage.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: A recording company's platter of Lurch's gravelly voice brings a screaming mob of teenage fans to the Addams house. To calm the crowd, Lurch seats himself at the harpsichord and rewards his fans with a song to end all songs.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Taken in by a psychologist's pronouncement that the only happily married couples are those who fight members of the Addams household devise schemes to start a battle between Gomez (John Astin) and Morticia (Carolyn Jones).

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez decides to bolster Cousin Itt's failing ego by making him the star of a production aimed as a birthday surprise for Wednesday. He hires the great director, Eric von Bissell, who gives Itt elocution lessons, causing a Hollywood star complex.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: While Morticia and Gomez are celebrating their 13th wedding anniversary, she tells Wednesday and Pugsley a bedtime story of how she and Gomez first met. In this episode, Carolyn Jones plays Morticia, Morticia as a 22-year-old, and sister Ophelia.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Wednesday and Pugsley refuse to go to bed until they hear the rest of the courtship story. Morticia resumes the tale via flashback, including the ceremony beginning with Ophelia Frump, Morticia's balmy sister, as the bride.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Romance seems close for Thing, the Addams right-hand-in-a-box, when Gomez's aunt arrives for a visit accompanied by Lady Fingers, her handmaiden. Thing enjoys the visit most because it gives him a chance to hold hands with one of his own kind.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez visit Mayor Henson to complain that their property tax is ridiculously low. After the Mayor proves his incompetence by offering a refund, Gomez is persuaded to become a candidate for the office.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: During a welcome home party for Cousin Itt, Morticia notices that the diminutive guest of honor seems to be losing his hair. Uncle Fester experiments with his chemistry set to produce a concoction that grows hair and tries the remedy on Itt.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Wednesday and Pugsley return in tears from trick-or-treating because a neighbor has told them there is no such thing as a witch. Morticia and Gomez plan to prove to the children that they do exist--by summoning a witch to a séance.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Determined to correct the dreadful literature that Wednesday and Pugsley are exposed to, Morticia sets out to create a new literary world. Gomez fears that his wife's first manuscript is so good, that once the publisher reads it he will lose her.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: In need of artistic fulfillment, Morticia takes up sculpting. An art critic views her first endeavor--a three-eyed Gomez statue--and clubs it with his cane. Gomez, who won't have Morticia's heart broken gets a seedy art dealer to buy it.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley copies one of his dad's old love letters and sends it to his teacher. Miss Dunbar comes to visit the Addams home and confesses to Gomez that no man has ever fallen so in love with her, leading Morticia to pretend to be the jealous wife.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: After Wednesday befriends a new boy her age, Robespierre Courtney, Morticia invites his parents, Mr. and Mrs. Henry Courtney to visit the Addams house for tea. Unbeknownst to them, the Courtney's are hoping to meet a number of the social set.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: A million dollars is at the final three teams' fingertips as they count out a maddening amount of poker chips and race to see Mr. Las Vegas, who holds the final clue to the one million dollar prize.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Eleven teams take off from Los Angeles, California on race around the world, starting with a stop in Valparaiso, Chile, where a high-wire walk Roadblock tests the mettle of several racers.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The ten remaining teams depart Palacio Baburizza in Valparaiso, Chile, taking a lengthy bus trip to Puerto Varas.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The nine remaining teams depart the Pit Stop at Gruta de la Virgen in Puerto Varas, Chile for Bariloche, Argentina.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The eight remaining teams depart the Pit Stop at Estancia Fortin Chacabuco in Bariloche, Argentina for Hamburg, Germany.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The eight remaining teams are transported from the Pit Stop at the Indra Club in Hamburg, Germany's red-light district to a mystery location in France.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The seven remaining teams drive from the Pit Stop at the Church of Massiges in Verdun, France to Reims.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The six remaining teams depart the Pit Stop in Champagne Ardenne, France and fly to the Seychelles.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The six remaining teams depart the Pit Stop on the Seychellian island of Praslin and fly to Penang, Malaysia, heading to the Snake Palace.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The five remaining teams depart the Pit Stop at the Pinang Peranakan Mansion in Penang, Malaysia and head to Singapore, where they learn that a U-Turn awaits.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The four remaining teams depart the Pit Stop at Marina Barrage in Singapore and fly to Shanghai, China.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The four remaining teams depart the Pit Stop at the Shanghai Science and Technology Museum, with Louie and Michael knowing a Speed Bump awaits them.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Brent and Caite, Jet and Cord, and Dan and Jordan leave Shanghai and head to San Francisco and the finish line.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: This season's racers are introduced and for the first time in the history of The Amazing Race, the team to finish in first place will be awarded a surprise, game-changing advantage.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Rather than eat Aunt Bee's indigestible homemade pickles, Andy and Barney secretly substitute store-bought pickles in her preserving jars.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: A trial run as Sheriff of Mayberry convinces Barney that he is not quite ready to take over a similar job in a neighboring town.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy dissuades a visiting farmer from marrying Barney's girl.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Opie keeps a secret club oath even in the face of the serious accusation of burning down a barn.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy teaches a wealthy young man the satisfaction of self-reliance.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: The men of Mayberry, after a slow start, accept the addition of a lovely manicurist to Floyd's barbershop.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: A Mayberry resident is convinced that he is a jinx until Andy helps restore his selfconfidence.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: The small-town methods of Mayberry prove more effective than the attempts of the State Police in the capture of a criminal.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: After Opie finishes last at a track race, Andy struggles to teach his son what it means to be a good loser.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy’s diplomacy and engineering skills are required to help the Mayberry choir adjust to the recent addition of tone-deaf Barney Fife to the group.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy and Barney are hard pressed when Mayberry's guest of honor turns out to be a pickpocket.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy uses his wits to help a struggling salesman stay in Mayberry despite strong pressure from the competition.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Aunt Bee becomes warden for a day when she disciplines Otis Campbell after he is arrested for his usual drunken behavior.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy is forced to exert all his persuasiveness to get a farmer to take a tetanus shot.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy and Barney visit the big city and help to catch a notorious jewel thief in the process.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Aunt Bee begins dating the dry cleaner because she wants to give Andy space to pursue his own relationships.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney learns the hard way that three’s a crowd, when Andy and Mary Simpson try to find time alone together.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Floyd expands his barbershop with the addition of a second barber. The new barber turns out to be a gambling bookie that Barney and Andy must catch in the act.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy is put on trial for his law enforcement practices when a Raleigh newspaper reporter writes a damaging article about the lawman.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney's cousin Virgil gets over his awkwardness as soon as he learns that people have confidence in his ability.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: When Otis Campbell’s brother comes to visit, Andy agrees to make Otis a temporary deputy to cover the lie Otis told about his career.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy fears Opie has an imaginary friend when he starts telling tall tales.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy's girlfriend Peggy McMillan gets along fine with Andy until he discovers that her father is rich.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Mayberry's new mayor doesn't like Andy or the way he does his job.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Aunt Bee heads out of town for a few days, leaving Andy and Opie to take care of themselves. When Peggy volunteers to cook for them, Floyd tries to convince Andy that she's trying to catch a husband.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: The Mayberry mayor demands that Andy get a crime expert from the city to help solve several cow thefts.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney tries to set Andy up when he mistakenly perceives that Andy is suffering from a broken heart.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: A real Bob Ross classic - the majestic snow-covered mountain, rolling foothills, leafy trees and bushes, and serene lake.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Bob Ross invites you to join him at a quaint little mountain-top home with a breathtaking view of distant snow-covered mountains.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Bob Ross teaches us the secret of his wet-on-wet technique while creating a restless ocean crashing against a rugged rocky coastline.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Bob Ross allows the greenery of a deep grove to be barely visible in the light of early morning - all tucked inside an oval.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Bob Ross creates a gentle brook flowing from one oval to another, under the protective branches and foliage of stately birch trees.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Nicholas Hankins: Bob Ross' Unfinished Season
programme.desc: Nicholas Hankins paints an evening thunderstorm that calls back to Bob Ross's final episode of The Joy of Painting for inspiration.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Join Bob Ross on a warm winter morning, the surroundings still undisturbed by Nature's little creatures; enjoy the freshness of a new day not yet awake.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: In the still of the night, trees reflect off the glistening pond and cool breeze of blows as Bob Ross takes you on this black canvas adventure.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Bob Ross invites you to experience the anticipation of winter's white blanket, moving in to create a soft, delicate draping of the cabin landscape.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: As the foliage reaches its peak of autumn beauty, experience the tranquility of a nice meadow, pond, and happy birch trees - all painted the Bob Ross way!

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: An abandoned shipping boat hugs a pier in a water scene that Bob Ross completes with some charming old dockside storage sheds.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Prepare the canvas just-so, and in the end, you'll have a Bob Ross landscape -- mighty mountain, homey cabin, and meadow -- in a window!

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: It's such a tranquil day down at the beach! Join Bob Ross as he paints a lovely little rowboat that awaits its owner's return.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: In the midst of the forest flows a stream that splashes and trickles endlessly along - Bob Ross depicts the true beauty of nature.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Guest artist Dana Jester creates a Bob Ross-style mountain scene with dignified foothills and evergreens, and super vibrant bushes.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Dry mountains, spiny shrubs and cacti, take a drive deep into the desert with Bob Ross and enjoy this fantastic oval surprise!

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Even the oval in this delightful Bob Ross cabin-by-the-river painting cannot contain all the succulent, glorious foliage!

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Painter Bob Ross invites you to enjoy the last of winter's snowy touch on canvas, as mountains and valleys begin to emerge from their slumber.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Bob Ross uses a golden selection of colors in this gorgeous fall mountain scene, all within a cleverly different oval shape on the canvas.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Take a walk with Bob Ross down a little lakeside path in a secluded place; you'll delight in the discovery of a small uninhabited island.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Bob Ross creates soft purple sky and tall trees that almost seem to float in the hazy foothills of a distant, blue-grey mountain.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Find out the answers to some of nature’s biggest mysteries! Why do gorillas spend so much time in trees, why do male lions have such shaggy manes, why do jellyfish live upside down? You’ve got questions, and Jungle Jack has the answers!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Picky Eaters
programme.desc: Feast your eyes on six species that take picky eating to the extreme! A panda that brunches on bamboo, marsupials that munch on eucalyptus, flamingoes that savor the flavor of algae, plus many more finicky eaters are on today’s countdown menu.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Rescued
programme.desc: Come along on an amazing adventure with some remarkable animals, like endangered cheetahs, an orphaned wombat, and even a grey whale, that are getting a second chance.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Come along with the Hanna's as they visit two all-American Arizona zoos. They encounter Elephants, Big Horn Sheep, Rhino, Giant Tortoises and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: In Costa Rica, Jack becomes enthralled with the country's beautiful butterflies, including the Blue Morpho, the “Queen of the Rainforest.”

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack and his wife Sue are in Montana meeting up with some amazing people who are taking animal rescue to whole new level! First, a couple that left big city life to run a ranch dedicated to animals in need.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack as he explores Rwanda's legendary Akagera National Park. The storied landscape is making a comeback, and home to Maasai Giraffe, Hippos, Elephants, Crocodiles, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Living on the Edge
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack Hanna as he counts down the species that live their lives where other creatures fear to tread – right on the edge!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: River Adventures
programme.desc: Get ready to set sail with Jungle Jack for rolling river adventures from Africa to the Amazon! Rivers provide more than drinking water for wildlife- a river can also be a habitat, a hiding place, and even a runway.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Extreme Destinations
programme.desc: From the mountain gorillas of the Impenetrable Forest, the Andean cat of the Atacama Desert, to the penguins of Antarctica, join Jungle Jack as he counts down the most extreme animal destinations on the planet!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Wild Countdown is turning 100! Join Jungle Jack as he celebrates by counting down his favorite adventures.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack for an underground adventure with Bats, Bears, Wombats, Rosy Bee-Eaters, and Iguanas.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jack for an adventure to the Galapagos Islands. He meets giant tortoises, land iguanas, sea turtles and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Greatest Apes
programme.desc: There are more than 200 different kinds of primates in the world today, but did you know only five are members of the exclusive club of great apes? Come along with Jack as he counts down his greatest great ape encounters!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Camped Out
programme.desc: Usually, Jack has to go out looking for wild animals. In this episode see what happens when he spends the night in their world! Hippos, bears, lions and elephants are just a few of the animals Jack encounters in his campy countdown!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack gets a special behind-the-scenes look at a retirement home for chimpanzees where caregivers have rescued over 250 chimps that now live in large family groups on specially designed islands in Florida.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack heads straight for the world-class Sepilok Orangutan Rehabilitation Centre that specializes in rehabilitating orphaned baby orangutans and releasing them back to their forest home.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Jungle Jack is lacing up his hiking boots and heading into the woods in search of creatures that flourish in the forest. Come along and meet cassowaries, forest elephants, koalas, bats and orangutans!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Whales & Dolphins
programme.desc: This Wild Countdown swims, leaps and breaches into the wonderful world of dolphins and whales. From inspirational stories to unbelievable adaptations, check out Jack’s most exciting marine mammal adventures.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he meets some superb simians, each with their own unique adaptations. Proboscis Monkeys, Spider Monkeys, Macaques, Mandrills, Langurs, and lots more magnificent monkeys!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jack as he takes his adventures to a whole new level with this journey through one of Africa's most pristine wild places. He finds baby elephants, rhinos, cheetahs, lions, hippos, and a whole lot more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he gets a rare behind-the-scenes look at the daily life of the Maasai in a village in Tanzania. Then Jack encounters Hippos, Jackals, Hartebeest, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: Jack and his daughter Kathleen depart Juneau, Alaska aboard the Wilderness Explorer in search of the endless natural beauty of Glacier Bay. Among their encounters: are bears, humpback whales, and glaciers. Jack also explores an old gold mine.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack heads into South Africa's Zululand for an adventure with Cheetah, Rhino, Dung Beetles, and the Nyala antelope. Then he is welcomed into a Zulu tribe, with his daughter Kathaleen.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jungle Jack takes his grandson on an epic Serengeti safari. They witness Cheetahs and Lions on the savannah, Wildebeest, and Zebra starting their annual migration, and visit a local Maasai school.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack for six of his all-time scariest safaris. Come along as he comes face-to-face with Alligators, Lions, Elephants, Cheetah, Tigers and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: ack and Kathleen visit Joaquin's massive farm outside Guayaquil where he provides a haven for 45 species of animals native to Ecuador, including endangered spectacled bears, tapirs, and great green macaws.

programme.desc: The Love Boat sails on a fantastic voyage to the most exciting ports in the Caribbean with a famed mystery writer (Pernell Roberts) who is willing to pay $100,000 to one of his hand-picked guests to solve the mystery of his missing nephew.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Julie is accused by a woman (Lani O'Grady) of stealing her fiance (Bart Braverman).

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Isaac causes comedic chaos when he convinces the crew to bolster his stagestruck aunt's (Isabel Sanford) ego, which turns her into an outrageous prima donna.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Capt. Stubing gets trapped in a love triangle by his old girlfriend (Sue Ann Langdon), now married to the ship's former captain (Mont model (Pamela Sue Martin) attempts to insure her privacy

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: The First Lady of the Silent Screen, Lillian Gish, guest stars as Isaac's former English teacher, whom he tries to avoid.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A judge (Nancy Walker) finds herself attracted to a man (George Gobel) she has placed on probation for being married to three women at once.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Gopher and Doc battle for the affections of Gopher's gorgeous pen pal (Marie Laurin) who has come to live with him.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Doc has his arms full when he agrees to show his best friend's amorous wife (Jill St. John) a good time.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A nudist (Barbi Benton) gets help from an attorney (Peter Haskell) when she wants to bare it all on board.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Some people murder for love. But these killers did it for the money. When greed is the motive, investigators must make every clue pay off.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Identifying Burned Remains: It's difficult to have a murder investigation without a body, and burning up the victim is a time-honored method of destroying physical evidence.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Profiles the work of world-renowned forensic experts and the procedures they use to solve murders and other mysteries in minutes or centuries after they happen.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Approximately 1.8 million Americans are reported missing each year. Some are runaways who find their way home, but others simply disappear. When foul play is suspected, investigators turn to forensics to find the missing.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Some people will let nothing stand between them and their goals. In their tortured minds, raw desire replaces all reason, and homicide becomes a convenient means to an end.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: In North Carolina, the home of a prominent couple becomes an unlikely scene of terrible bloodshed. Across the country, a California woman vanishes, worrying her family and the investigators trying to find her.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Ballistics: A corpse is found with a gunshot wound to the head; the weapon lies next to the victim. It looks like suicide, but could it be murder? It's a question best solved by ballistics experts.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: CI: Coroner Investigator will reveal the most in-depth look to date into the science of death.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Forensic Sculpting: Forensic sculptors retrieve people from oblivion. Using clay and an intricate knowledge of anatomy, forensic arts place a face on an unidentified skull, recreating the victim's likeness, which often leads to his name.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A dog can be a dead man's best friend. Dogs have been trained to sniff out corpses, drugs, explosives, and missing persons. They're often the first to find the essential clue that sets an investigation in motion.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A woman's body is found and investigators have little time and few clues to lead them to a killer who could strike again. Perpetrators try to conceal their crimes, yet savvy investigators can take the most obscure data and recreate a murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Fingerprinting: The identification Division of the FBI relies on fingerprints as one of the most effective ways to identify criminals.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Every family has its secrets, and sometimes blood relations lead to bloodshed. When money is the motive, murder can rip at the very foundation of marriage and family.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: For serial killers, once is never enough. For investigators, the challenge is steep when the killers murder by numbers.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A deranged ex-prisoner of war, cruelly abused in a Northern army prison, captures Lucas, locks him in a cage and vows to make him suffer for his part in the Civil War.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A traveling salesman can't talk his way out of an assault charge.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A janitor-turned-gunfighter's reputation hangs on one lucky shot and a lot of gall. The handyman finds himself in trouble when he accidentally kills another gunfighter.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas tries to get help when he is shot after witnessing a murder.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: After being foreman of a jury that convicted an Apache, Lucas is marked for death. Now, he must discover who is behind the curse.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Two pranksters write away for a mail-order bride, using Lucas's name.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Schoolteacher Helen Foley finds a strange and very serious little girl on the stairs outside her apartment. The little girl seems to know her, and tries to jog her memory about a man she saw earlier that day. The man arrives at Helen's door…

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Riding home on the train one day, a man falls asleep and dreams it is 1880, and he is entering a small town called Willoughby.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A man, desperate to win the affection of a beautiful woman, slips her a love potion. He is overjoyed that the potion works so well...at first.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A trumpet player who's convinced he'll never amount to anything attempts suicide and finds himself in a world where no one can hear or see him.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An eccentric loser gets a new life from his guardian angel, but there is a price to keeping it.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A woman discovers that the floor of a department store, on which she bought a gold thimble, doesn't exist - and that her 'saleslady' is really a mannequin!

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A scientist arranges to have his human-looking robot pitch for the struggling local baseball team.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A playwright makes characters come to life.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A pilot of a downed WW II bomber comes to in the African desert and desperately tries to find out what happened to the rest of his crew.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A luckless couple stumbles upon fortune when a genie materializes from a bottle in their antique shop. The genie grants them four wishes but warns them, prophetically, to be careful what you wish for.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Small time criminal Jackie Rhoades must face both his past and his conscience while waiting for his next assignment.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Bartlett Finchley's paranoia about the machines around proves true.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Seeking refuge from a storm, traveler David Ellington comes upon a bizarre hermitage of monks, who have imprisoned a man who begs for his help. When David confronts the head monk Brother Jerome, he is told that the man is the devil, and David must decide

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A young woman lying in a hospital bed, her head wrapped in bandages, awaits the outcome of a surgical procedure performed by the State in a last-ditch attempt to make her look 'normal'.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A pair of newlyweds stopping in a small town are trapped by their own superstition when playing a fortune-telling machine in a local diner.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The daughter of an inventor objects to their 'perfect' home where they are waited on by mechanical servants.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A nostalgic actor revisits his late wife and friends at their old haunt, only to find that he is now out of place there.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: When three dum-dum crooks get ahold of a camera that takes pictures of the future, they set out to make a quick fortune with their new toy.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: After a derelict Santa Claus is fired on Christmas Eve, he finds a mysterious bag that gives out presents. With this bag he sets out to fulfill his one wish - to see the less fortunate inherit the bounties of Christmas.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: In a tragic, western town, a desperate father begs for clemency as his son is slated to die for an accident he could not have prevented.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: At a prominent club in Washington, D.C., a socialite argues about whether it would be possible to change history by traveling back in time. When he leaves the club he finds himself in 1865, on the night that President Lincoln will be shot.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A used car salesman buys a car that dooms him to tell only the truth.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: When a woman investigates a clamor on the roof of her rural house, she discovers a small UFO and little aliens emerging from it. Or so it seems.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Gaining telepathic abilities when his coin lands on its edge bank clerk Hector B. Poole learns about the difference between other people's plans and fantasies.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: While in the hospital recovering from overwork, Liz Powell keeps dreaming about going down to the hospital morgue.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Passing through the sound barrier a commercial airliner inadvertently travels back in time.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A timid vacuum-cleaner salesman is given the strength of 300 men by some experimenting aliens.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: After finding and establishing a new shelter, members of the group consider things returning to how they were before; Carol must make a difficult choice.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl struggles to fit in with his new group while Glenn finds Maggie's messages and races to catch up to her.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Many paths collide on each group's travels; Rick remembers the past and faces sheer brutality; the group struggles to survive.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The true motives of the Terminans come to light when Rick and the others end up in a vulnerable situation.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick leads a risky mission for a possible small reward when the supplies run low and the group's mistrust of people grows.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick and the others find themselves pitted against a nasty group but may have a plan to gain the upper hand.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Another group of survivors is introduced, and although things appear safe and nice, there is a bit of a dark side.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The group must contend with a new set of issues while out on a mission, and must push through to survive.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Stakes are high when members of the group must go on a heroic rescue mission in a previously known location.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The group is spread thin with some members holding down the church and the others on a rescue mission.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: New enemies disregard rules and morals; although Rick wants to find a peaceful agreement, the enemies seem to prefer a more violent resolution.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: After facing all of the recent trials, a slight detour may offer the solution that the group has been seeking.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The group feels beaten after living life on the road, but must continue to trudge along in spite of the changes they have incurred.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: After withstanding a spectacular storm, Rick and the others meet what appears to be a friendly person, but find themselves mistrustful.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The group has a difficult time molding to a new lifestyle, forcing them to consider whether they can be the people they once were.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: As Rick and the others continue to acclimate to their new surroundings, they consider a return to normalcy.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: While trying to secure a new home, Rick and his group face challenges, and question the utopia they find themselves in.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Después de separarse de sus hijos, Maggie, Gabriel y Rosita siguen un convoy militar hasta un destino misterioso. Ezekiel, Kelly, Negan y Annie acaban en una zona de obras. Daryl y Carol siguen a un tren que lleva a Connie a bordo.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Ezekiel y Negan organizan una revuelta clandestina contra los guardianes. Aaron, Jerry, Lydia y Elijah se unen a Luke y a Jules durante su huida a la costa. Además, Eugene es juzgado con el apoyo de Yumiko como abogada defensora.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Los alejandrinos y los prisioneros vuelven a la Commonwealth para enfrentarse a Pamela Milton. Por otro lado, una horda se acerca a la ciudad.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl y Carol llevan a Judith al hospital, mientras que Rosita, Eugene y Gabriel buscan a Coco. Por otro lado, Maggie y Negan se enfrentan a Pamela y los héroes se reúnen para una última batalla.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick Grimes, policía de una pequeña localidad de Georgia, despierta de un coma y repentinamente se encuentra en un mundo apocalíptico. Desorientado, en busca de su familia y una explicación a lo acontecido, Rick ha de adaptarse al nuevo orden.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick llega a caballo a Atlanta, donde encuentra una ciudad desolada. Tras escapar de una situación de peligro, Rick se une a un grupo de supervivientes en unos grandes almacenes, donde le espera un enemigo más peligroso que los zombis.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick regresa a Atlanta al sentirse culpable de haber dejado a Merle abandonado en un edificio asolado por zombis. En el campamento, la inesperada llegada de Rick causa tensión entre Lori y Shane, quien había asegurado que Rick había muerto.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: En Atlanta, una banda armada sorprende al grupo de Rick mientras están buscando a Merle. Entretanto, en el campamento, Jim empieza a comportarse de forma extraña, tiene premoniciones y asusta a los niños con una tragedia que se aproxima.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Tras el ataque al campamento, Rick conduce al grupo hacia el CDC, un recinto de la base sanitaria militar, en el que esperan encontrar un refugio seguro. Durante el trayecto, Jim debe tomar una decisión extremadamente difícil.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Un científico inquietante deja entrar a Rick y su grupo en el CDC. No obstante, hay algo extraño y los supervivientes del apocalipsis zombi empiezan a sospechar que no todo es lo que parece en el recinto.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El grupo, liderado por Rick, se topa con una horda de zombis en mitad de la autopista. La pequeña Sophia, asustada, huye sola al bosque y todos tratarán de encontrarla antes de que sea demasiado tarde.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick encuentra una granja en la que buscar ayuda para salvar la vida de su hijo, quien recibió el impacto accidental de una bala. Después, Shane entra en una escuela llena de zombis para llevarse material sanitario junto al tipo que disparó a Carl.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Shane y Otis están atrapados por los zombis en la escuela adonde acudieron por el material sanitario necesario para operar a Carl. En la granja, surgen las primeras tensiones y Daryl y Andrea vuelven a salir en busca de Sophie.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Shane regresa a la granja con las medicinas, pero el sacrificio que he tenido que cometer no es bien visto por el resto del grupo. En la granja, el grupo intenta sacar a un zombi del pozo de agua fresca antes de que la infecte.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Mientras busca a Sophia, Daryl sufre un accidente que lo deja perdido y herido en el bosque. La tensión entre el grupo y los propietarios de la granja aumenta, así como la inestabilidad del propio grupo, debido a que Shane desafía a Rick.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: West meets up again with his old enemy, Dr. Miguelito Loveless, who is engaged in a whimsical plan for wholesale murder.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret Agent West challenges a bizarre scheme to control San Francisco Bay Shipping with rockets fired from Alcatraz Island.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A grieving father who is the town drunk hires Josh Randall with his last $30 to find his murdered son's body, but Josh's search for clues runs up against a cowardly conspiracy of silence.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: At the request of his friend's wife, Randall comes to assist and protect a war buddy in his bid for the town's mayoralty, quickly running afoul of the established political machine and its corrupt mayor and wanted sheriff.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A bounty hunter is not a hero in his own hometown, as Josh learns when he honors a dying friend's request to return his body to Cameron and the townspeople rush to judgment, believing Josh killed him for the reward money.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is approached by the wife of a wanted man eager to turn himself in peacefully, provided Josh splits the bounty with his wife.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A man with unwavering faith in a legend about lost treasure hires Josh to lead his family on an expedition into the desert to locate the cache of Spanish gold.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: When a young runaway is framed for killing a Pinkerton agent, Randall turns detective to uncover the real killer.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is requested to meet a famous singer at the opera house in Denver who has a job for him.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh comes to the aid of his old friend Jesse, who is being strong-armed into selling the Outrider Hotel and Saloon owned by his beautiful girlfriend.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A decidedly different and dangerous assignment awaits Josh when he agrees to go into the Apache camp and compete in their contests to win the hand of a woman.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Pursuing killer Joe Collins into the Superstition Mountains, Josh is followed by a man who believes Collins could be his long-lost son.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A blindly obedient religious cult cast lots and it falls upon a young woman to act as its angel of vengeance.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh receives a letter from a girl at the St.

programme.desc: A concerned father hires Josh to retrieve his son, a passionate young ideologue whose gift for rousing rhetoric is being used by plunderers to recruit freedom fighters.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh's big talk after a dog is shot lands him in big trouble when his browbeating the locals in the saloon about ending the decades-long Carter-Blake feud.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: To track down the cheating tinhorn gambler Johnny Deuce and recover his money, Randall befriends the card sharp's protégé, a 12-year-old orphan boy and card cheat, nicknamed The Montana Kid.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh embarks on a mission of mercy when he pleads with the parents of a boy with appendicitis to let the doctor operate.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh reluctantly accepts an offbeat assignment: finding a beautiful bride for his bashful buddy Charlie, the homeliest and loneliest man in the West.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: The government employs Randall to portray an escaped prisoner in order to trick his cellmate into leading authorities to the $50,000 he stole and stashed away in a secret location.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Randall finds his prey in the hands of a lynch mob wiping out his bounty.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Who needs enemies with friends like the residents of Rogue City, who celebrate Randall for bringing in notorious killer Jumbo Kane.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Randall is rooked out of his bounty by crafty criminal Hunt Willis and his accomplice.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Against better judgment after losing a quick draw contest and bet, Josh serves as a guide for a dandified East Coast gun salesman who comes west to retrieve and replace a defective gun he sold to notorious outlaw Curly Bill Brocius.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: On the trail of a Cavalry deserter and the horses he stole, Josh rides into a town ruled as the private fiefdom of its autocratic, psychopathic marshal who is holding the horses and deserter.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Raoul de Moreney -- a slick card shark and fortune hunter -- comes to Tombstone in search of quick riches. His vicious greed nettles the editor of the Epitaph and, in a flush of anger, the two men agree to a duel…but de Moreney is a deadly duelist.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Gunslinger Jake Hoyt plots a radical means of rising to power in Tombstone -- by snatching the sheriff's job away from Clay Hollister. To succeed, Hoyt plans to outshine Hollister as a sharpshooter. The result is inevitable: a dramatic showdown.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: While the survivors of an Indian attack dig the victim's grave, they discover a vein of silver. The strike ignites a wrathful dispute between the two prospectors and the dead man's kinfolk over shares of ownership of the new-found fortune.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Hollister is taken prisoner by a trio of fugitives who need him as a guide on their escape route to Mexico. Left with his guns but no bullets, the sheriff searches desperately for a means of escape and must make a last-ditch gamble for survival.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: An enraged Apache bravely kills the white man who murdered his father. Both Sheriff Hollister and the victim's brother pursue the Indian -- with very different goals -- and trap him in a box canyon that the Apache has rigged with dynamite.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Gunman Nate Crandall murders a rancher to steal $20,000. Sheriff Hollister gets to the loot first and locks it in a safe. Determined to get the money, Crandall involves young Jim Edwards in a plot to rob the safe and take the fall for the killing.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Reverend Tuttle is aboard the stagecoach when it is robbed by three masked gunmen. Sheriff Hollister suspects Big Jim Sten, boss of a nearby town, is behind the robbery. But when the reverend and Hollister visit Sten's town, a secret is revealed.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory

programme.title: Tombstone Territory

programme.desc: With Yugi at the end of his ropes and the maniacal Marik waging all-out war, can Marik's oldest friend reach Marik in time to help him come to his senses before his insanity overwhelms him?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Will the combined force of all of Yugi's monsters be enough to defeat an Egyptian God that terminated two other powerful Egyptian Gods? The fate of the world hangs in the balance with the finale of the Battle City Tournament!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: KaibaCorp Island is set to explode in mere minutes, but the blimp's engines are offline! Can Yugi and friends escape from the island in time, or will they sink to the bottom of the sea?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Téa and Serenity tour around the Town of Domino and reminisce about their friends' battles during Battle City, they learn how much they've grown and far they've come... and how far they have left to go!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian God Cards are stolen! A terrifying new villain emerges! Real monsters begin to appear around the world! Can Yugi and the gang discover how these strange events are connected before the planet is destroyed?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With Seal of Orichalcos, not only can Gurimo have ten monsters at once, but each creature receives a power boost from Orichalcos's malevolent energies! Yugi better find a way to protect himself against Gurimo's horde!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Not only is our world on the brink of apocalypse, but an entire domain of monsters is also on the verge of collapse! Both Earth and the monster domain must unite and fight against the largest terror they have ever faced!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the gang set off on a cross-country trek when they're asked for help from a one-eyed former foe.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba returns to Duelist Kingdom for a showdown against Pegasus! Will Kaiba discover the secret behind Pegasus's strategies before he loses his soul, just like he did on his first trip to Duelist Kingdom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Not only does Alister's fiend gain attack points for every fiery monster on the field, but it can also take control of Kaiba's monsters! Will Alister get his revenge, or will Kaiba get aid from the monster domain?

programme.desc: Mai's back to help Yugi take down Dartz and save the world from annihilation... or is a topsy-turvy twist in the works?

programme.desc: Mai has joined the enemy! Is she brainwashed, or is there some deeper reason for her unexpected transformation?

programme.desc: With the potent powers of Claw of Hermos, Joey transforms Time Wizard into an almighty... hammer? Can Joey master the uncanny abilities of his new card to pound Mai's Harpie Ladies before they slash him to shreds?

programme.desc: Professor Hawkins has discovered startling connections between the world's conundrums, the Orichalcos stones and an ancient lost civilization.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Using the abilities of Seal of Orichalcos, Yugi grinds Rafael's guardians, but he's also succumbing to the card's evil influence. As darkness grows within his heart, the consequences of his non-heroic acts may be his undoing.
